description: Enter and explore the marine realm of Hurghada Grand Aquarium, home to more than 1,200 marine animals of over 1,000 species, across 22 different exhibits, each one as fascinating as the next. It's an experience you won‚Äôt forget. The diverse marine science and conservation ventures include, breeding and conservation programs for endangered marine animals and habitat and continuing efforts to educate visitors on the importance of the ocean.

reviews.title: Ok not great
reviews.text: Lots of different fish the tunnel was the best bit, not so keen on the zoo bit, pricey for the couple hours it takes to go around but enjoyable.

reviews.title: A-Must see in Hurghada
reviews.text:
A splendid and joyful tour. Enjoyed every bit of it - the kids loved it so much. 
Spotlessly clean place with friendly and kind staff.

reviews.title: Nice few hours out
reviews.text:
We enjoyed our visit here as 3 adults and 2 children. 

The entry price is a little steep but as a holiday treat it is ok. You can also purchase food to feed the animals which is must. 

There is plenty to look at and the feeding time with the sharks is great as you get to see all the turtles, stingrays etc.

My little one loved feeding the fish and monkeys. 

I do agree with a few comments, I did not like that the feeder was teasing the fish with their food for picture opportunities, I felt that quite unfair. The staff where also giving the larger tortoises to people to hold, I didn't really like this either. But if you take it for what it is you will have a good time.

reviews.title: A nice look at local animal life
reviews.text: One hour tour to Hurghada Grand Aquarium was one of our stop during our Egypt tour. It was interesting and educating to see some local animals in addition to marine life. It is a little on expensive side for a ticket. But you pay if you love animals.

reviews.title: Ok aquarium with BEST TAXI EXPERIENCES !
reviews.text: This Aquarium is below expectations but the taxi ride is so amazing with Mohamed. He is honest, humble and he keeps to promises. Always prompt to all bookings. Most importantly is i have been out all week with so many different taxi rides, his car is the most adequate car to provide services unlike others. Always very clean car and it is new. Anyone who loves to have a safe trip in hurghada may contact him through WhatsApp @ +201026376372. Never try local taxi as lots of them are so pushy and they charges 3 to 4 times the price. I know Mohamed through uber. Tour operators arrangment from airport to hotels in hurghada also charged well too much and the car was so uncomfortable. Mohamed is the best person you can trust in hurghada if you like to have a safe  and happy trip!

reviews.title: Avoid! Poorly treated animals, terrible fish tanks. Bad smell!
reviews.text: The place is so so sad. Dirty place, bad smell, deteriorated fish tanks, plastic plants. Ohh poor animals. Avoid! It is also very expensive.

reviews.title: Very good
reviews.text: Very good experience and activity specially for young children to sea such a great collection of the red sea marvellous collections.

reviews.title: Awful
reviews.text: Awful experience. Expensive for family 32 USD. Per person this includes children over 10. Owners proof not accepted which would make it affordable despite showing owners contract and passport.

reviews.title: AVOID, AVOID, AVOID
reviews.text: I wish I had read the reviews!! As this is the largest aquarium in Africa and built in recent years, I expected animal welfare to be paramount. I thought the days of animals in small enclosures were long gone. There are too many fish in the tanks and the enclosures way too small for the animals in the small zoo. There does not appear to be anything in the enclosures to stimulate the animals and the water in ALL the tanks was very murky & dirty. A diver in the main aquarium that has sharks and stingrays teased them with a fish so the tourists could get a better camera shot. The whole aquarium is already quite run down & dirty. And to top it off, the admission is ¬£30 EACH!!! I had a day trip to Luxor for ¬£60 which included admission to the main ancient sites and lunch. Much, much better value and didn't leave me feeling guilty for having fallen for the hype on the aquarium website! Please, please don't visit, it really is not worth the money.

reviews.title: Don't miss visiting this place
reviews.text: Nice place and helpful staff, contains different types of fish and animals, my sons liked feeding the Koi fish by hand

location.address: Safaga Villages Road Opposite between Magawish and Mercure Hotel, Hurghada 84511 Egypt

description: Since it was first established on an area of 170.000 m2 in 2009, Senzo Mall has continuously developed and enhanced the shopping experience in the Red Sea Area to outstanding levels. It is the one and only shopping mall of its kind with many international and local brand stores, a diverse food court, indoor children‚Äôs amusement park, hypermarket and regular Live Music and Kids events in the mall. Indulging in its unique location in the city of Hurghada among a group of luxury hotels, it is just a short drive away from the Hurghada International Airport. Shopping is the ultimate pleasure at Senzo Mall, a new city center - a favorite destination that offers all the best in one place.

offer_list.title: Full-Day Private Cultural Tour of Hurghada
Safari Hurghada

reviews.title: Perfect for shopping
reviews.text: Great place if you are Hurghada. Get away from the hustle and bustle of the city and just shop in your own pace. Great selection of shops and restaurants. As a tourist I definitely recommend to my fellow travellers.

reviews.title: Cosy, clean & affordable
reviews.text: This is the best place to shop in Hurghada. Senzo has a lot of shops where you can buy European-style clothes, shoes, cosmetics, bags and kids‚Äô stuff for very affordable prices. Most shops have fixed prices and the staff are friendly. There‚Äôs also a big supermarket with fixed affordable prices if you‚Äôre looking for gifts, food, clothes, or household stuff or almost anything. Senzo has also coffee shops, KFC and a McDonald‚Äôs that‚Äôs a lot cheaper than in Europe. Skip the bazaars and go here instead to avoid stress.

reviews.title: Good for about everything and we'll priced
reviews.text:
Good experience here. Felt like price wise things were decent. Seen some reviews of crazy prices but the shops I went to were cheaper or in line with the UK. Mcds for 2 meals and 3 happy meals cost approx ¬£16.

There is a kid zone with rides etc.. again kids enjoyed it. Each ride costs  tops ¬£1.  A lot of the rides cost 60p. 

Lots to do.. really good experience

reviews.title: Rip off duty free shop
reviews.text: Duty free shop the was the worst place in the mall with completely rude and arrogant sales assistants that put up the price of vodka giving no receipt and I would think taking the rest of the money for themselves. When we arrived the man had done a deal with another Egyptian man, think the shop/goverment is being ripped off and so are the customers avoid at all costs awful place. The rest of the mall was great and recommend no hassle, lovely people but stay clear of duty free the men are lining there own pockets.

reviews.title: rotten food in a supermarket
reviews.text:
There is a supermarket where I bought some candy which turned out to be past the expiry date which I found out when I came home. I live in Holland so I don‚Äôt expect supermarkets at such place to sell stuff past expiry date. I also bought a kilo of finiki. When I came home they tasted rotten en some were covered with mold. I had to throw them away. 
Besides, I asked for a price of some bracelete and it costs there double than the identical one in Spain.

reviews.title: Senzo situate near my favorite hotel Neverland üéÑ
reviews.text:
Basically we visited Senzo sometime üéÑ 
Last time administrator assisted me, I paid $, he changed dirham. For presents I bought Egyptian black tea and hibiscus üå∫ too many packets.

reviews.title: Grat shopping mall to suit everyone
reviews.text: Good selection of stores and various outlets to eat. Very clean facilities throughout. Plenty of space everywhere and there was no crowded areas. Something there for everyone.

reviews.title: Don't bother
reviews.text: Not all that,  in the middle of nowhere with bland shopping and expensive. Don't bother taking the time to go

reviews.title: FRAUD! Very disappointing
reviews.text: Avoid DeFacto store and don't use your card for payment because the prices are fake. I have bought swimsuit underpants and the price was 99 Le. When I checked my receipt and bank account later it occurred I payed 399 Le. It is a FRAUD! The receipt says I've bought Tankini, which consists from 2 pieces of clothes. But there were No the second (upper) part of the swimsuit and the salesperson didn't mention it

reviews.title: Not worth it
reviews.text: Nothing special at all, very expensive probably more than UK, AVOID duty free shop as they rip you off (charged 600l.E for some unbranded cigarettes) definitely won‚Äôt be returning

reviews.title: Best water park in Egypt
reviews.text: This water park is the best water park I have been to in Egypt, it is the biggest & most fun there are so many different slides to chose from and a lot of variety so that all people can have ago. You can also purchase a day pass if you do not stay in jaz aquaviva hotel which is amazing. We will definitely return to Egypt because of this water park üëç

reviews.title: Just perfect, enjoy your ride
reviews.text:
The water park is highly recommended.
Whether child or adult it is a lot of fun. There are many different slides and also some for a real thrill. We have enjoyed it very much.

2246

reviews.title: Brilliant
reviews.text: Amazing water park, really big, the slides are great. Nice and clean area. Would definitely recommend a visit.

reviews.title: Nice Experience
reviews.text: It was not crowded. Too many steps to go up to the rides though. Some of the pools were not heated..

reviews.title: Aqua park
reviews.text: The aqua park it was very good and amazing it‚Äôs so big and really we enjoyed it as well and sometimes it‚Äôs better than go to the see and also the hotel very good and I had enjoyable time with the animation here and the quality of the aqua park it‚Äôs very good really I will come back for it again

reviews.title: Clean, fun and well staffed! ‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è
reviews.text:
We travelled here via Uber from our resort just a short drive away. Tickets were good value and included soft drinks and snacks from the dedicated food court area. 

The water park was clean, well staffed and lots of fun. 

I‚Äôd recommend it for couples and families with children of all ages!

reviews.title: Makadi Bay WaterWorld African Bar
reviews.text: It was very great, from many people I met, this guy Mohammad was very nice and kind, he make me smile everytime I saw him, not like other annoying  people, just go and enjoy time in this bar, maybe if u like him a lot, bring him home, if u live in hot nice place he deserves it :)

reviews.title: Very good
reviews.text: I love the water park here, staff are  always friendly, most water slides are always working, and there are loads of the waterslides. Overall I enjoyed my experience here.

reviews.title: Perfect waterworld
reviews.text: Good hotel! Perfekt water land for kids. They love it and play everyday. Also close to the beach where they can swim!

reviews.title: Ice cold water
reviews.text: The water is ice cold. The small children are freezing and come out the pool shaking, a sign that the water is too cold. My children‚Äôs lips turned blue after 10 minutes. The Red Sea is 10 times more warmer.  Forgot your swimming goggles, bring wet suits instead

reviews.title: Very positive
reviews.text: Super clean, very nice staff, food was excellent, in the middle of water park where there's lots to do. Overal a great experience. Definitely recommended!

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.text: Great service, nice smile entices the staff.  Hardworking and committed employees, especially Mohamed Mahgob and Mahmoud.  Great service at Soprano Restaurant, especially Mahmoud. Mega Aqua Park will definitely be back.

reviews.title: Good
reviews.text: Very nice hotel, lots to do for kids. Lively animation team, always there to help. Good food. Really recommend! Would go back definitely.

reviews.title: Amazing place to stay.
reviews.text:
Excellent staff, very attentive. From sorting your room to getting you a drink. 
Food: great choices, always something you like.
2nd time ive been here its that good.
Aquapark is amazing. If all the pools dont impress you then the Aquapark will.

reviews.title: Good but could be much better.
reviews.text:
Long time to check in.
Most of the Aqua was not heated in winter time.
The food was limited choices and not good taste.
Room was full with ants and not clean.

The good thing was variety of aqua slides in the new extension, but maybe for summer time.

reviews.title: Poor customer service
reviews.text:
Unfortunately my experience with this hotel wasn't great. 
You pay to have a good holiday with your family but the end of day you find out that the place is just looking ok but the service is very mature. 
They are selling on the website site variants of type of food ( lying) when you get there you will eat  rice, steak stew and roast chicken every day.
Make sure that you bring lot of money to give them because they don't stop to begging money. 
Customer service there is not respect at all with the client....
I'm not recommend at all.... it's very poor quality and customer service. 
I wouldn't coming back at all.

reviews.title: Highly recommended
reviews.text:
Great hotel with stunning grounds and facilities.
All staff were incredibly polite and helpful. The choice of food and multitude of restaurants was fantastic.
A special mention to the Mediterranean restaurant Manager Mohamed Askar, as he truly made our holiday with great conversation, hospitality and creating a wonderful experience every time we met. We cannot praise him anymore if we tried.
100% recommend visiting this hotel. We will definitely be returning with our children, they will love the aqua park.

reviews.title: Only visited the aqua park, but all inclusive deal was not okay
reviews.text:
Slides are nice and aqua park itself is nice.
BUT I was very annoyed with the all inclusive arrangement.
We had a ticket for an All inclusive day, and were expecting to use the all inclusive format of the hotel. But we could only use 1 of the restaurants (the one in the far corner of the park). They only served a small lunch and had a selection of 2 meals only. There were around 60 people waiting in line, because everyone had to go to that restaurant. Also during lunch the slides closed for 1 hour.
Drinks were included, but for a beer they wanted an upcharge. No snacks, nothing except minimal lunch options. If we would have known this upfront, we would not have booked it. It wasn't worth the cost if it is only slides, we think.

reviews.title: Couldve been better
reviews.text:
Better enterainment -wasnt impressed wjth the entertainment. My daughter got bored after 2 days.
 Not the same thing over and over again. 
Also the flyboard guy after his show my 5 year old daughter lined up to take a photo onthe flyboard like they all did. We even asked the guy if she could go on there he disagreed but because a girl had her boobs out, half naked he let her on there which my daughter was extremely upset about. You know sometimes its your apperance that attracts so i gues he was so unfair on this note. Disgraceful.

The restaurants are so far apart i have 2 kids. 1 2 year old and others 5 so felt like i had to travel to each restaurant to search for what my daughters would like to eat  it was a neve endjng treck and i hated this.  Ever again.

The mascots were brilliant!!!
My daughter loved suleman from the entertaiment team. He was great with kids.
She loved abdul hamid from the restaurants. He was a friendly guy and always so helpful.

reviews.title: Perfect‚Ä¶ can‚Äôt wait to return‚Ä¶again üòÉ‚òÄÔ∏èüòÉ‚òÄÔ∏èüòÉ
reviews.text:
This is our family‚Äôs second visit to jungle aqua park. The staff are amazing and so friendly. 

The rooms are always clean on arrival and throughout our stay. 

The food again is very good, something for everyone at breakfast, lunch and dinner. 

Bar staff are not shy on the vodka haha

Any trips booked I would advise going through momen, you will find him in reception or on Facebook and speaks very good English. 

Our family stayed in a bungalow and had a pool in front of our room which are usually quiet so perfect if you want a little quiet time away from the water park.

The water park is the best in Hurghada. 

We were very lucky to of had a fabulous lifeguard in the pool going by the name of Mohamed abd ELD ahab , he is a credit to aqua jungle and made mine and my family‚Äôs holiday complete. We are sure to stay in touch. 

If you are a young couple, a family with children of any age or a looking to enjoy your retirement then this is the place for you. 

üòÉ‚òÄÔ∏èüòÉ‚òÄÔ∏èüòÉ

reviews.title: Outside visit
reviews.text: We came here in late afternoon. It is a very nice mosque to look at with its many domes. We could only view from the outside as it was prayer time. It is still worthy the visit and the fish market is nearby so combine a visit to the two.

reviews.title: Welcomed as visitors and took our photos inside.
reviews.text:
Visited the Mosque shortly after midday prayers.Very welcoming providing suitable long dresses for the ladies with Head covering.
Special visitors viewing area provided and not hurried through or hassled.Offered to take our photos to obtain the best internal views.Created good impression for visitors.

reviews.title: Big mosque... friendly atmosphere
reviews.text: Big mosque... friendly atmosphere. nice guide. Rent long dress for 1 euro to enter (only for women).

reviews.title: Stunning
reviews.text: We enjoyed a beautiful visit to the Mosque during our visit to Hurghada. Stunning building & architecture.

reviews.title: Great to see inside a mosque
reviews.text: The mosque is beautiful inside, we had to wear long gowns which are provided for you to go inside but was worth the visit, the locals had it renovated and it is definately a labour of love

reviews.title: very good
reviews.text: nice place to pray and to take some photos there, very crowded on Friday and feast time, it is very big but I think it is the biggest mosque in red sea area

reviews.title: part of a city tour
reviews.text: Very interesting to see the new Mosque, shame the location is in an area that is not all together the most attractive

reviews.title: Breathtaking
reviews.text: This is one of the most beautiful things - pieces of architecture - I have ever seen!! I loved every minute of it, especially how unearthly the whole thing was!

reviews.title: Mosque of Thausand Nights
reviews.text: It's amazing place you can visit there and it's beside the fish market which is unique and resnable prices you can bargain don't missed it

reviews.title: biggest mosgue in hurghada
reviews.text:
im a tour guide and i feel happy taking guests from all over the globe to that mosque
great design and beautifull building

name: Hurghada Marina
ranking_subcategory: #7 of 55 things to do in Hurghada
subcategory_ranking: #7 of 55 things to do in Hurghada
ranking: #7 of 55 things to do in Hurghada
description: Starting from June 2008 Hurghada Marina Boulevard has offered Hurghada city a great opportunity to enjoy the sea breeze in a quiet, amazing place. Hurghada Marina Boulevard offers you a different experience of outings & entertainments, Whatever you're looking for .. you'll for sure finds it at the marina. From different venues, lounges, restaurants & bars, you can easily find what will be satisfying for your appetite. add to that the great experience of shopping at the commercial area which you'll find unique gifts & souvenirs which sure you're looking to buy for your beloved ones back home. We've made sure to present the elegant variety of international kitchens to satisfy your taste & gives you a chance to open up & try new food. The day time you can't ignore the amazing sea & exciting water & sea activities which you can enjoy with your family & friends. Hurghada Marina Boulevard where the Adventure never ends...

offer_list.title: Hurghada: 3-Hour City Sightseeing Tour

reviews.title: Eat cheap
reviews.text: Late evening visit didn't give the whole picture. It looked neat and nice. We chose a restaurant haphazardly just because our friends were there, just about to leave. We had a soup, a T- bone steak, a bottle of wine and beers, coffee and shared a water pipe/ shisheh. The prices were low, the service impeccable, the food ok but maybe I am choosy, I am a chef. I'd rather had experienc d the marina in daylight, but didn't get occasion to.

reviews.title: Lovely clean Marina
reviews.text: The marina is lovely and clean mainly bars, cafes, restaurants. We went in the daytime it was lovely and hot and had some lunch. I think I would of preferred to go in the evening when it would of been busy, because it was quite dead. Only thing I would say they need some benches so you can sit down and enjoy the marina and boats, only place to sit is in the bars or restaurants. Our hotel arranged the taxi and took us straight there and picked us back up.

reviews.title: Night time stroll
reviews.text: Went here in the evening and took a nice stroll along the marina and back. Very pleasant and many nice boats to look at. Many restaurants set back from the promenade.

reviews.title: Lovely
reviews.text: Amazing place/ we went few years ago to the same place/ but now it's new with a lot of new coffee shops and sailing boats. Amazing place to visit

reviews.title: Nice place to walk around.
reviews.text: Nice to walk around and have a drink, no seats to sit on you have to go into a restaurant or bar, one great bar if you want a laugh is the Havana bar.

reviews.title: A nice area of Hurghada
reviews.text:
We stayed at the Boutique hotel at the Marina, it has the most amazing roof top terrace for breakfast each morning that overlooks the marina, a lovely way to start the day! 
This is a nice area, very pretty with some good restaurants.
It is safe and clean, no-one hassles you or tries to rip you off here, unlike the area outside the Marina! 
Boat trips can be booked directly at the Marina, for a good price.
There is a small beach here, Blue beach. It is being refurbished but is still a very well equipped area, with lovely sheltered sun beds and bean bags, a pool, volleyball, cafe and bar, speed and banana boats for hire,  and a great team who look after you.

reviews.title: Very enjoyable
reviews.text:
Its always nice to see how the other half live!!
Beautifully kept clean Marina, plenty of space to wander, lovely fishes to see in sea,
Fabulous boats.
No hassle from restauranteurs to eat at their particular place. Free to roam and enjoy without hassle.
Did enjoy a very nice meal.
Think best time to visit is probably evening.

reviews.title: Fabulous Marina Promenade.
reviews.text: Classy marina bar and restaurant promenade complex, really nice for relaxing stroll (day or night), few drinks and a meal. Some very impressive yachts to look at. Puerto Banus without the bar and restaurant price tag!! Recommend you visit.

reviews.title: Definitely worth a visit
reviews.text: Smaller than you think, restaurants had mostly the same food with a few exceptions, lovely for a stroll at night with good security presence. Feedback would be the cocktails were not great, but we didn‚Äôt visit all venues.

reviews.title: Lovely
reviews.text: wonderful place to walk almost no vendors and many restaurants with a good selection, everyone is nice and don't forget to say hi to Oscar (the camel) before you go home

location.address: Saqala Square Hurghada First, Hurghada 84511 Egypt

name: El Gouna Cable Park Sliders
location_string: El Gouna, Hurghada, Red Sea and Sinai
ranking_subcategory: #13 of 55 things to do in Hurghada
subcategory_ranking: #13 of 55 things to do in Hurghada
ranking: #13 of 55 things to do in Hurghada
description: The entire area consists of 90 000 square meters and includes two spacious cables. The first 5.0 System, is equipped with a slalom course and a selection of large Rixen obstacles. The shorter 5.0 Clockwise system is an exclusive wake cable with many different sliders and kickers. There are also two 2.0 System so called "Easy Rides" for beginners to achieve their first successes. In order to ride also in the evening the entire park is equipped with a professional floodlight system. Due to the nearly perfect geographical location of El Gouna, we offer our guests a year-round program with various national and international competitions at the highest level. On Top of that we have excellent Restaurant, Swimming Pools and Kids Area. Hope to see you here.

offer_list.title: El Gouna Private Tour from Hurghada Customize your day

reviews.title: I recommend it
reviews.text: The best service and very kind people very helpful.  I really enjoyed the day I would love to visit again very soon.  Thank you

reviews.title: Fun day with the kids
reviews.text: We did the 1 hour lesson for the 4 of us and it was lots of fun. The instructor had plenty of time for the kids and was very patient. We ended up having lunch there which was good enough, and had drinks all afternoon in the sun loungers whilst the kids were playing in the water floating park, again with another instructor who kept them safe and even played with them. Definitely recommend

reviews.title: Always great atmosphere.
reviews.text: Always great atmosphere with lots of activities. Not only the wakeboarding but also volleyball, private pool, adventure/obstacle park in the lagune and good food and drinks.

reviews.title: Great instructor
reviews.text: Had a great experience at Sliders learning to wakeboard. Great, patient instructors. Got up and riding in no time. Brilliant fun

reviews.title: Wonderful lovely trip
reviews.text:
Lovely exciting spot where you can have a water sliding training with reasonable rate.

Liked the restaurant as well.

reviews.title: I actually made it üòé
reviews.text:
I‚Äôve always wanted to do wakeboarding, my friends always do it from jet ski and was never able to understand it‚Äôs logic.

There I met Mustafa, one of the instructors there and he gave me a queue of 1-2-3 actions to do in order to be able to do it.

I actually focused on doing so and boom, I‚Äôm on the board wakeboarding for 30 mins.

Advice; if you ever go, go for more than 30 mins

reviews.title: Amazing thrill
reviews.text: Great ride today and was up from the 1st trial thanks to Coach Yasser - great guy and pushes you to learn new tricks. Highly recommend it .. you can book half OR 1 hr

reviews.title: Fantasitic
reviews.text: I took a 30min lesson and I really enjoyed it. I had a good instructor and I think the price is really fair. I'm new to this kind of parks but I was impressed by the setup. I thought the equipment was good. Staff were all friendly. Would like to spend more time there in the future.

reviews.title: Great cable ski park
reviews.text:
Visited Sliders many times and always enjoy my time there. Professionally run, and always improving. Beautiful pool and chilling areas when exhausted from wake boarding.
2 small points that I think could be improved on. First the exit area on the left lake is extremely uncomfortable to walk on when coming out of the water. A astro mat in the water could cure this. Also some of the rental gear if a little 'tired' and could do with replacing.
Apart from this I think Sliders is great and will return the nest time I'm back in El Gouna

reviews.title: Amazing place and I will visit it again
reviews.text: The place vibes is so amazing. The staff are genuinely sincere. The place is divided into three major activities beach club, cable surfing and sliders, which allow you to spend the whole day there without getting bored. I tried the sliders for half an hour and it was enough for a couple but if you have a larger gathering you will enjoy it more. I tried for the first time my surfing experience and it was amaaaaaazing although I though it will be so hard to enjoy it in 1 hour but the coach was good and the whole experience was so good. It a little bit pricey but for a place of a kind in el gouna I guess it worth it. I‚Äôll pay it a visit again for sure.

reviews.title: Great spot for food, drinks, yacht watching
reviews.text: A lovely place to stroll, admire the luxury yachts, shop, stop for coffee and eat. If you want the beach, head to the end of the marina to Moods beach club where you can hire a sun bed for 250 Egyptian Pounds for the afternoon (and the food is great). Abu Tig has plenty of great apartments to rent: often much more affordable than the big hotels, then you can be spoilt for choice when it comes to eating out (rather than the same old buffet!) The marina is ultra safe, peaceful and with a relaxed vibe.

reviews.title: Impressive upmarket marina
reviews.text: Having only stayed in Hurghada previously we ventured up to the marina at El Gouna  for lunch. It‚Äôs like a totally separate community (it‚Äôs worth taking your passport as we nearly didn‚Äôt gain entry. Luckily our driver convinced security to let us in).  It also helps to have a restaurant reservation I understand. We hadn‚Äôt done that either. I love the fact that it is purpose built and immaculate. I‚Äôd read that the prices were high for meals. It might be more expensive here than other areas of Egypt but as British tourists we are used to paying these prices and much higher in parts of Europe.  It was very quiet so did lack a bit of ambience but I think most people take a later lunch here. Everyone was friendly and we enjoyed a Tuk Tuk ride to the main gate where we were meeting our driver. Security were kind and let us shelter while we waited. I can‚Äôt wait to go back next year. I loved it :-)

reviews.title: artificial place
reviews.text: all gouna is artificial for me, i like natural places more, prices there are very expensive with no food taste, just few places have a good taste

reviews.title: Best place in Gouna!
reviews.text: The best place in terms of everything; View, restaurants, Cafes, beaches & Bars. You can easily enjoy your day there without the need to go anywhere.

reviews.title: Best of Best
reviews.text:
Abu Tig Marina is one of the best spots in Gouna. Excellent restaurants and bars, a mix of shops and wonderful place to walk and people / boat watch. 

Gouna is a true oasis of peace and calm from Cairo. Very organised, clean and well planned out. 

Gouna and Abu Tig truly are a state of mind.

reviews.title: Good Experience
reviews.text:
We had a great time snorkeling around the Giftun area and didn't find it too crowded when we went. If you're a good swimmer you can get some distance and enjoy the reefs and colourful fish. Call ahead and check with your resort in Hurghada to see if they have an on-site company for a tour or check online for a tour for your interests.

We would suggest bringing your own water or drinks because Orange Island is a little pricey. Our tour only offered soft drinks and coffee so we were happy to have our own water.

reviews.title: This is not a must
reviews.text: A snorkel could be nice and you could spend hours in these waters. Crowded place and very expensive drinks are a let down.

reviews.title: A must visit!
reviews.text: I really liked there. The beach and the water color was exceptional. Good prices and a well-stablished beach bar. Just be careful with the rocks!

reviews.title: Lovely island
reviews.text:
Beautiful island with fine sandy .clean island and beautiful coral reefs for the snorkellers.
It was a great day in the island

reviews.title: Orange Bay must be on your itinerary
reviews.text: If you‚Äôre planning a trip to Egypt make sure you add this amazing island to your itinerary! We had the best day thanks to Mr. Abo Elhassan and his team, the food was delicious, great views and just a stunning place to spend the day. Thanks Abo for making our day perfect you are one of the best things on the island!

reviews.title: We booked an orange bay excursion with Oranten Travel and we had a really good
reviews.text: We booked an orange bay excursion with Oranten Travel and we had a really good time on the boat It was a really nice boat and the staff were so friendly there was two toilets on the boat and there was free drinks also on the boat and we had some fresh fruits at the beginning of the day it was so tasty and then we arrived at orange bay island at the island when we arrived we had a place to stay and keep our stuff and the island wasn't crowd then we started moving in the Crystal shallow water and we went on the swings which were so amazing for photos and then we went on a high wooden building it had a really fantastic view at the top of this building and then we went back at the same place we were staying to relax there was also a bar contains some drinks for a price we have stayed 2 hours on the island after we met again with the group we started moving back to the boat and when we arrived to the boat we had our lunch the food was so tasty we loved it and after lunch we went to snorkel we saw many beautiful corals and many types of fishes we really liked the snorkeling with our snorkeling guide after snorkeling we went to do the water sports which was banana boat and sofa boat it was so fun then we went back after finishing the water sports and in our way back we had some fruit it was really fantastic day

reviews.title: It's not paradise.
reviews.text:
We went on a boat trip to Orange Bay with snorkeling. Whilst the snorkeling was fun and we did see some beautiful fish the coral reef is bleached and dead. I can only imagine what it was once like and it's very sad to see it like this. 

Orange bay is supposed to be a paradise Island. It really isn't. There must have been 15 boats at least bringing people to the bay. You get herded to marked off areas  and the guaranteed sun loungers are set out in rows of two with an isle in the middle and are more like bean bags on the floor. The sea is nice but not really any different from the beach at our hotel. If you want a picture on the swing you will need to queue for ages, we didn't bother.

Drinks are very expensive and there was one waiter for our section so the service was slow. 2hrs here was ample.

reviews.title: Amazing place. I will go again
reviews.text: I went by a yacht trip and then stopped there and it was an amazing and unforgettable trip and the water was clear and had a good corals and fishes down there

reviews.title: Nice colors under the water
reviews.text: Very nice Place.to make do many activities . Snorkeling was nice i can't explain this paradise view under the water.

reviews.title: Orange Bay is a must see
reviews.text:
Orange Bay is a very paradisiac beach, beatiful water, so many colors of blue.
When you get there, there is lots of tents for the tourists, but by the time we were there (around 1PM) there werent many peopple around, which made the visit very pleasant.
But I suppose (by the number of tents available) it can get crowded.
Anyways it is a must see in Urghada, so much more beautiful than Urghada beaches (which are beautiful). It took around 1 hour by boat to get there.

reviews.title: Amazing island
reviews.text: Very unique experience to Mahmya island, it was a little bit expensive but it worth the money, beauty of Hurghada

reviews.title: Good day out, great snorkelling
reviews.text: Good day trip, booked with Tui after our pre booked trip was cancelled. Coached to meet the boat, then on the sea for 45mins (was a bit chilly ) got to the island and given snorkel and flippers, allocated an area on the beach. Beach bar (drinks not included) then back on the boat for 1( minutes to stop for snorkelling, the water was choppy but had a life jacket so no issues, excellent snorkelling , reef is beautiful and lots of fish to be seen, back to the island for buffet lunch, reasonable choice if food and soft drinks, couple of hours free time before heading back, promise of a sunset view but we were back before it set so little disappointed. Not bad value for money.

reviews.title: Disappointment
reviews.text: Mahmeya. A beautiful island and a beautiful beach. But the service sucks. First of all, the food has become so disgusting that even hungry people don't want to eat it. Secondly, in order to get a bottle of wine, you need to run after the waiter several times. As a result, he brought a completely different wine. And finally, check your bill. They attribute unnecessary positions. Our 5th visit to the island and complete disappointment.

reviews.title: Fun day with great team
reviews.text:
We went to paradise island early morning with the roland1 boat from our hotel 
Crew very nice .we speak da couple of our on the island and then went back to two nice spot for snorkelling and finally a spot of fishing to finish the day . Great fun , good group and fun day

reviews.title: Hoards of boats
reviews.text:
We found the setup lacked any sense that this is a special nature area. 

Hoards of boats head out with visitors, there‚Äôs two visible landing areas with cheap looking signage and a beach restaurant development albeit built as sustainably as possible). 

There‚Äôs no real sense of protection other than the messaging around the corals which are worth exploring. 

But if you‚Äôre looking for space this isn‚Äôt the place to go.

reviews.title: Mahmya Island  !!
reviews.text:
I really like to leave a comment here for other people who want to visit the Island Mahmya and don't know (yet) what to find on this beautiul place on earth...
--
I visited this Island during my last stay in Egypt (18-10-2022) with my best friend.

During the boattrip to the Island it was already clear by seeing the pictures in the internet that it would be a great place to stay , but after arriving i was completely surprised by the beauty of just everything ... the amazing colour of the water , the way of how the island was decorated in style, the atmosphere which immediately surround me like a warm coat , the staff which was very thoughtful and personal by calling me by name , very professional , the food we ordered was very tasty and nice served , in the background relaxing music which made all very complete.

We also made a lot of beautiful pictures which i keep as precious memory , but for sure we will be back , no doubt about it !!

On our way back we enjoyed an amazing sunset on the boat which made that day  unforgettable  ... 

But better you go watch yourself and have an unforgettable addition to your holiday in beautiful Egypt

reviews.title: Nice but Over- priced
reviews.text:
Nice sun beds but beach very busy and saturated with people, doesn‚Äôt feel premium and exclusive when there‚Äôs hoards of people. Restaurant is high up so hard to access with pram. Food was tasty but served cold. Snorkelling off the beach was poor, but sand was nice and soft and sea warm. 
Don‚Äôt think it‚Äôs worth the premium price to visit.

reviews.title: Lovely island trip
reviews.text:
Just back from this island trip .
We booked it through our tui rep at about ¬£71 per person .
It was a 40 min coach ride from makidi bay where we were staying .
Nice air conditioned bus collected and took us to a small marina and was given a cold bottle of water and asked to pay the environmental/ tourist tax of ¬£5 a person , we then waited around nearly 45 min for late comers , which really annoys me ( eating into our already short day ) these people should be left behind if they can‚Äôt be bothered turning up on time .
Once we set off it‚Äôs about a 45 min boat trip to the island , where you get on a smaller boat that can take you to the jetty .
Island is clean and we had a decent meal 1/2 way through our trip ( chicken / meat / rice / fruit / soft drinks ) one thing I would say is the food could have been warmer .
Great clean clear sea , where you can snorkel and see plenty ,if you don‚Äôt want to go on the free snorkelling boat trip to a coral reef that is about 45 min away .
I would have liked proper sun beds instead of big mattress plonked on the sand & maybe some one coming round taking drinks orders - even at extra cost .
Please use anti inspect repellents when here , we all got bit .
All in all great trip and would recommend- Carlos was a great host

reviews.title: Well worth a day out
reviews.text: Booked via Rep ¬£70 each plus environmental government fee for boat trip is $5/‚Ç¨5/100egp. Don't pay in ¬£'s as charged at ¬£5 which is more. Boat trip was lovely and calm. Our guide Sarah was absolutely lovely and cheery. On arrival you get some time to snorkel in the shallows near your allocated sunbeds. Snorkeling equipment included if required. Lots of fishes to see. We found a couple were really inquisitive and kept swimming at us as if playing. You then get the opportunity to take a boat trip out to the reef. Very good experience although felt rushed. It was very difficult to film or photograph anything as you were constantly called to move on as limited time. I'd have preferred to cover less distance and given more time to look. The food included for lunch was really good. Selection of meat, chicken, pasta, rice and salads. Our return boat trip back was great fun. One of the guys offered to do some creative photos for us on our phones, at no charge. I honestly think he should offer it as a service as really quite good. We got to see an amazing sunset on the return which finished off the most perfect day. Definitely somewhere I'd like to return.

reviews.title: Paradise island!
reviews.text: Wonderful island paradise  amazing day to relax, eat and snorkel. Should I win the lottery anytime soon I would love to hire out the island throw a massive party and you are all invited! ...Very professional set up from beginning to end .

reviews.title: Brilliant.
reviews.text: Basic but the most amazing adventure. Lovely beach, great food and staff, brilliant for diving and snorkeling, you won‚Äôt get better. Very secluded and great for chilling out, highly recommended.

reviews.title: We loved it here
reviews.text:
We came to complete our Open Water certificate. Thanks to Walid and our diving instructor Mohamed we really had a wonderful experience. The coral reef is beautiful and we always felt safe and well advised. 
Apart from that the resort has also a very good service. The rooms were always clean and the food was delicious.
Thanks for making this trip so special!

reviews.title: Priced far too high for what it is
reviews.text:
Good, as long as you have your head in the water - That's about it. Such a shame it is so expensive! Traveling in a group of 6, we wanted to come and snorkel here for a couple of hours. We got a taxi and arrived but on entry we had to pay $162 ($27pp no food inc). This is a beach and hotel on the edge of a building site, and there's loads of flies. Not great. There's a small coral reaf here where you can dive even as a first timer.

4* for snorkeling
-1* for everything else

Positives - There are toilets on site 
Negatives - Cost, flies, small beach

reviews.title: Oasis of peace
reviews.text:
Fantastic place at the end of the world.  Hidden gem situated 40 min drive from Hurghada.Stayed there for 10 nights , traveling solo .Rooms very simple and basic. There was a small fridge and a kettle.  3 meals a day were provided- buffet like.  Food was tasty. Isolated hotel far away from busy life of Hurghada. Ideal place for those who want relax in a spectacular landscape.
Staff very friendly and helpful.Specially Mohammed always very polite and willing to help. I would definitely recommend a visit to Sharm El naga.

reviews.title: Amazing place
reviews.text:
We loved our stay here! Amazing coral reefs, really the top we have seen in Egypt.

The staff and receptionist are incredibly kind, they made our trip extra special.

Rooms are always clean. Food is very tasty and also the right choice of food is served to fuel you up for the day. 

A hidden gem for divers and snorkeling.
Also the hotel provides transportation with a very reasonable price.

We are definitely coming back.

reviews.title: Snorkelling Hotspot
reviews.text:
One of the main reasons I come to Egypt is for the snorkelling. I was on T.A. looking for a reputable company to take me on a snorkelling trip (having previously doen the island / boat trips). 
A destination expert recommended a company called Tourific Excursions and I contacted them. One of thier trips is to Sharm El Naga where diving & snorkelling is possible straight from the beach.

I arrived about half 9 in the morning and settled on to a small beach with a view out  across the bay.  The host advised us that there would be two guided trips - one in the morning and one in the afternoon with lunch in between.

Both snorkelling trips were excellent - each lasting approximately an hour and there was time for personal snorkelling too.  The water was easily accessible from the beach and was warm.   Visibility in the water was very good (especially in the morning) and we saw plenty of fish - including Lion Fish.  

Lunch was provided as part of the day as was free water. The food was fine and the water was cold.

Although busy, it was never too busy and for anyone wanting a snorkelling day out, I would recommend a visit to Sharm El Naga.

reviews.title: Snorkelling Paradise!!!
reviews.text:
This place is a hidden gem, we had a great 1 night stay & spent 2 days snorkelling. The staff are all great, so friendly.  The food is amazing, plentiful & delicious.
The rooms are very clean & serve a purpose for sleeping, it‚Äôs about the coral reefs this place! 
I would highly recommend Sharm El Naga!

reviews.title: Beautiful Beach, Fantastic Snorkeling
reviews.text: I loved staying at this lodge! It was fantastic! After I left I experienced an all-inclusive in Hurghada, both a condo and hotel in Sharm el Sheikh, and a beach house in Dahab. Sharm el Naga Beach Resort was my favorite! The staff was super kind and accommodating, the beach quite lovely, the food the best I've had in Egypt, but most importantly, the reef quite beautiful and unspoiled, particularly if you swim out in

reviews.title: Good value for money
reviews.text:
I love this place! This is my second time and I will come again for sure. The reef is great for diving & dive guides are good and friendly. 
Food is clean and tasty, but basic, so don‚Äôt expect something out of the ordinary. 
Rooms need refurbishing, especially the ACs: last year I had a problem in my room, and this time too - last time they fixed it and this one they moved us to a new room where the AC is working.
Good value for money.

reviews.title: Relaxing
reviews.text:
The place is awesome it managed to get rid of the camp hassle 9for families) while preserving the camp spirit by providing nice rooms with the basic needs (AC, refrigerator, TV, clean private bathroom)
The food was very nice 
The place is not family friendly unless your kids enjoy the sea.
Adding some activities will be very nice as the only activities are swimming, snorkeling, diving.
The road to enter the facility is an unpaved road and quite bumpy.

reviews.text:

It was nice trip ‚úåÔ∏è

reviews.title: MESMERIZING
reviews.text: This is the most beautiful church I have ever seen in my entire life. There are not many christian religious people here, but once they see this church they cross themselves and bow and it‚Äôs insane because if you think about it where we live (I‚Äôm from Europe) we have churches everywhere and no one is ‚Äúso devoted‚Äù to do this. The stain glass is beautiful, you can‚Äôt look away from it. Even if you are an atheist, you would still find it beautiful

reviews.title: nothing speshal
reviews.text: This is ok to visit if you have not been to a coptic church they ask you to put this dress type thing on then charge you for it But it the travelers choice

reviews.title: Nothing special
reviews.text:
I booked a Hurghada your and the church was part of it. The church is not very special, but the story is. 

Apparently, in the old days ‚ÄòCoptic ‚Äô meant Egyptian and Christian as well. Nowadays, when you say you‚Äôre Coptic, you mean you‚Äôre Christian. In the old days, there were hardly any moslims in Egypt so their was no need for distinction. 

The church itself is white and the glass in lead is made with bright colours. Churches are usually dark and somber, but this was bright and happy. 

That being said, it‚Äôs the only positive thing. It wasn‚Äôt a special church, just ordinary and plain. I did like the hospital and school, because a church also has a social function. The poor go there for schooling and for medical aid. At the gate, they offered me bread too. Very nice. 

You have to pass a control gate with armed police. That is normal for religious places. It also happens at the mosque. 

In short: Nice to have seen, if you haven‚Äôt seen it, you won‚Äôt miss out.

reviews.title: Jewel in the Crown
reviews.text:
this Coptic Christian cathedral is ion the old town of Hurghada. It will be worth hiring a taxi to do the tour rather than join a hotel group which can take longer to pick up and drop off various people for the city tour.
Beautiful stained glass windows that tell this Coptic Christian history.  Worth visiting on Friday around non when the children are off school and a there is a party atmosphere

reviews.title: Take a guided tour
reviews.text: Friendly security at the gate. What an amazing church to visit and reflect upon. A must visit. Worth paying for a guide.

reviews.title: Great place to visit
reviews.text: Very nice Koptic church. Safety means you should bring a passport, but otherwise very nice. Met a guy who explained a lot to us, bought some funny booklets in arabic for the kids. Been there 3 days before christmas (theirs, that is! On 6th of january), would have loved to stay for christmas mas!

reviews.title: Beautiful, quiet, and renewing
reviews.text: It was refreshing to discover this jewel of a church in the middle of Hurghada.  After a hectic day of touring about having some time to just sit and let my eyes wander over the beautiful front alter, up over the white ceiling and the arches, to rest on the wooden benches with the inlayed and pierced aisle "gates".... relax and close your eyes.  Listen to the evening chant, the people in prayer, the teenagers giggling.... it was peaceful and so nice.  Yes, they have security at the gate but if was a friendly search just keeping everyone safe and while my partner is Coptic, I am not so was just enjoying the architecture, the mosaics, and the painted saints.  A small gift shop offers a plethora of religious items.  it's certainly worth a visit and a nice juxtaposition to the giant mosque near by which is also worth a visit.  In all of Hurghada I never felt any sense of animosity towards people of a different faith or culture - how I wish more of the world could live like that.

reviews.title: Service and communion in the coptic church
reviews.text: Visited a service at the coptic Church for the second time. They have one morning service, sundays at 7.00 am and a second at 9.00 am. If you want to take communion you are supposed to fast from 12.00 pm. Everything is in arabic or coptic, so I didn¬¥t understand a lot, but could recognize parts of it anyway. A very nice break in the vacation.

reviews.title: An unexpected find!
reviews.text: A interesting find,Inside and out. A small museum,with an interesting book collection There's free WiFi, Toilets and somewhere where you can buy drinks.. All for ¬£1.. Was a nice stroll from our hotel too.

reviews.title: Peaceful
reviews.text: This is the local library supported by Alexander books. The material is for the Arabic community therefore I didn't read anything. However it's such a lovely place to go. In the middle is an open air circle of seating and you can get cool fresh water. Worth visiting.

reviews.title: Don't miss it
reviews.text: Brilliant place. Culturama show is great and in many languages. The building is fresh, clean and very well kept. And the staff are friendly and professional.

reviews.title: read some original books
reviews.text: the place organized  by the great Alexandria library hosted by sawiras foundation and it has some of the originals books so if you  a foreigner you will enjoy reading about our egyptian ancient hostory from original source

reviews.title: Cloudy day in El Gouna....so a lovely visit
reviews.text: A cloudy day, so we decided to come and visit the Library...very interesting ...we watched cinematic experience....and enjoyed it very much...6 euros each...and we then had two hours free internet...so here I am doing my review.....we do not have internet in our Hotel room..so just catching up.....a pleasant way to spend a couple of hours...

reviews.title: Peaceful area improving your knowledge
reviews.text: When your board of bathing Bibliotheca in English a library is worth a visit. There is a cinematic experience certainly very good alone. A fountain in the centre.

reviews.title: The most beautiful place
reviews.text: Very beautiful place with fountain in the middle, nice movie Culturama about history of Egypt, kind helpful people, Mr Sama is always ready to help you. One of the best places in Gouna!

reviews.title: Small collection
reviews.text: Well-decorated and nice-looking, but may not find an extensive variety of books inside, as the name may suggest, but still not bad. Also, it was 44 Celsius and the A/C was not on. Checked to see if one could borrow books during vacation, but according to the paper on the reception desk, membership is monthly/annual or there is the option of borrowing and leaving a deposit of EGP 300.

reviews.title: Must Visit
reviews.text: Must Visit, even though its a very different mood from the sandy beaches and thrilling activities available in Elgouna, but you must take the tour and go through the Culturama show,, it is truly the most underrated activity you can come across!!!

reviews.title: This place is a haven of peace and quiet.

reviews.title: Lovely sand art
reviews.text: Amazing sand sculptures of people and characters. Good for photos. Doesn't take up a lot of time to see the whole place.

reviews.title: A Perfect Family Art Tour
reviews.text:
Amazing Place ‚Ä¶ Artful and Beautiful 
Kids enjoyed the sculptures‚Ä¶ both historical and kids cartoons. 
Friendly Staff ‚Ä¶ extremely polite and helpful. Both adults and kids enjoyed the full tour inside sand city 
Wish to see more sculptures.

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.text:
The sculptures were amazing, very skilled artist however you can walk in and out in around 15 minute and take photos of each sculpture. Met Alex the camel. Was friendly and his keeper was nice but say the kids on for a photo but then decided to walk them round on the camel and charge 20usd. This would have been great as an add on to another place such as mini Egypt or the aquarium not as a place on its own. 
I don‚Äôt know how long it‚Äôs been in hurgada. We have been every few years and not seen it before but would not go again and not worth entrance fee for. 10/15 minute visit

reviews.title: A bunch of crooks!
reviews.text:
We got to the place and the guy at the front ran my card and it said it successfully went through.  He told me it was declined and proceeded to run it 3 times!  Then I used a different card and it also went through - so 4 times total!!!  They lied through their teeth and showed me that it was "declined", but all a lie.  I had to dispute it when I returned to the States!

For the city itself, the artist is incredibly talented and we were fortunate to meet him as he worked on a sculpture.  Very nice guy!  It's such a shame that his work is misrepresented by crooks that work the payment stands!

reviews.title: Good to pass an hour
reviews.text: This is good for an afternoon visit, few cute statues to see and the staff are pleasant and helpful. There is a camel Bobby Brown, you can say hello to him. He is friendly. He appeared well cared for and was in the shade getting fed and fluids Reassuring as a lot of animals in Egypt are poorly cared for.

reviews.title: ok to visit if you have nothing to do
reviews.text: Some of the exhibits are coming loose and not value for money - Entrance fee EGP 200 for adults. There was a lion cub which you could take photos with for a fee which appeared to attract more attention then the exhibits

reviews.title: all wonders of the world in one place
reviews.text: We enjoyed the place very much! I was astonished with the first part where masterpieces from different cultures and countries are represented. My teenage daughter loved the second part where she found her favourite movie and cartoon heroes. But the most amazing experience was meeting the author of the most of these sand sculptures - Abanoub Khali. It was an honour for us to meet him and to know more about his work. You should definitely visit Sand City)

reviews.title: Sand city Hurghada
reviews.text: Great place.A must see.A work of art.Really cool for kids and teaching them how to do the sculptures with sand and paints. It‚Äôs made out of love

reviews.title: Tips for Visit
reviews.text: Sand City is located about 20 minutes by taxi from the centre of Hurghada. You can pay the entrance fee in a variety of currencies including Egyptian, English (¬£10) and Euros.  The site has historical (buildings and people) sand sculptures and cartoon/film characters. It also has a small cafe, toilets and the staff are pleasant. If you ask for directions you may have difficulties as no-one including hotels and nearby shopkeepers seemed to know what I was talking about when asking for the 'sand sculptures'. If you specifically ask for 'Sand City' hopefully you will have better luck than I had in locating it!

reviews.title: Not Really Worth It
reviews.text:
The actual 'display' is very small - two sections - one of historical interest and one of cartoon characters (children's cartoons).  For the entry price of ¬£10 per person, we would have expected more.  It took us an hour tops to see everything, take photos and have a chat with a guy trying to sell trips on a camel!
Really not worth the price of entry.

reviews.title: Best holiday ever.
reviews.text:
This is a very good hotel. The food in all of the restaurants is very high quality. With 5 restaurants to choose from you will not be stuck with the usual bad food that you often get at all inclusive holidays. The Lebanese restaurant was a firm favourite for us, but the others are all high end. The service throughout the hotel is outstanding. We were well looked after throughout our stay, by very attentive staff. The animation team are a great bunch, providing fun and games especially Kareem whose energy is endless and addictive. The spa team do a good job, although some of the treatments are a little pricey. Ther excursion team were great and having done some research beforehand we were impressed by the cost of these. Monsour really did look after our needs and ensured we did the things that really interested us.
The only think that let's this resort down is the drinks/bar. There is very little choice of soft drinks or alcohol. Soft drink choice is sprite coke or squash! There are no menus in any of the bars. The quality of alcohol is very poor and the team are not trained in mixing drinks, so there is no consistency. We had to go off site to get a decent drink. Please, please fix this so you can be the perfect place.

Staff , security were all professional and friendly.
I really recommend it.

reviews.title: Amazing. Best neighborhood in Hurghada
reviews.text: Awesome neighborhood and experience with the Locals. Like it so much better than the tourist sections. This is the real deal. Prices half off!!!!

reviews.title: An absolute dump of a place
reviews.text:
I'd say it is like Hiroshima on 7th August 1945, but that'd be unfair on Hiroshima as there wasn't any taxi drivers ripping people off there. 

Uber is a MUST as the taxi drivers will try to rip you off even after you agree a price with them. 

Dahar is a horrendous place full of conmen and pick pockets, doubley horrendous if you're a woman who doesn't want to be harassed beyond belief. 

There isn't much aesthetically pleasing about this area either, least of all the broken buildings, never finished building sites, open skips, and piles of rubble you'll inevitably see.

If you're holidaying here don't leave your resort or stay in El Gouna instead.

reviews.title: Shock factor trip, not essential for Hurghada
reviews.text:
I'm not raving about this place like everyone else here. It was a normal fruit&veg and livestock market and it's as described - an authentic Egypian market. But tbh it is like any other market in Europe, but dirtier and with more livestock. If authentic Egypt is seeing animals being live butchered to you then go, otherwise there's not much to see.

It looks like the type of place Bird Flu started.

You're really not missing anything if you skip this, you won't find souvenirs and probably won't buy anything.

If you really want to go, Google will take you to the wrong place. Got to Mr Grill instead and the market is behind that area.

reviews.title: Surprising
reviews.text: You have to see this because it opens a world you can‚Äôt and will not be able to imagine unless you‚Äôve seen it yourself, with your own eyes. People can be bargained with - I would not advise to buy a lot of things from here - overall positive and negative things I remember from this market. It‚Äôs a must see thing however, to experience the whole Egyptian feeling!

reviews.title: A must see for a ‚Äòreal‚Äô Egyptian experience
reviews.text:
If you can‚Äôt read Arabic, you‚Äôre toast! Just gotta hope they don‚Äôt overprice the goods, but‚Äôs that‚Äôs the only thing you have to be worried about. 

It is an amazing experience. Everything is so nicely put and all the produce is from Egypt. I never knew they grow avocados and mangos in Egypt! People are so friendly. You can try so many things, dates, strawberry‚Äôs. I have seen the biggest broccoli and cauliflower in my entire life. Very impressive. I think they weighed at least 3 kilos, but likely more.  I‚Äôll add a picture of them as well. 

The live stock wasn‚Äôt a very pretty site. I have chickens myself and the chickens there looked ill. No wonder, they don‚Äôt have any space the poor things. 
I have seen fruits like ‚Äòashta‚Äô, a peculiar looking thing which tastes like banana and mango. Delicious! Brought some home with me. 

An experience one must have! Just go with the flow and you‚Äôll love it.

reviews.title: El Dahar fruit market
reviews.text: The highlight of the old town in Hurghada is the souk. Every time I visit El Dahar, Hurghada, I go to this market. There are lots to see and do. The atmosphere is one of a kind. You can‚Äôt experience it anywhere else in Hurghada. It‚Äôs the most authentic part of the city.I would strongly recommend everyone to go there and have a look at this place. It is easy to spend hours there, browsing the local produce and spices. Fruits and vegetables are fresh and organic.If you want to see and explore real Egypt in Hurghada, go to El Dahar Market.

reviews.title: Old Town of Hurghada
reviews.text:
People goes there to shop for fruits, perfumes and souvenirs for reasonable prices. The only landmark there is El-dahar church. It's crowded and a bit messy but it is safe.
Go there if you want to shop or you're interested in seeing downtown. Otherwise don't leave the beach to go there.

reviews.title: Egyptian culture area
reviews.text: El Dahar is local peoples shoppping area and you can find good prices and interesting shops. Small sandy streets and bit dirty area is not for everybody.

reviews.title: Fruit paradise
reviews.text: This is a fruit and vegs paradise for an average price. Do not hesitate to go there to buy some extra food for the family back to the hotel and carry done st yiur home destinations. Prices are fixed and shown on the signs. The life Huck - try to teach the arabic digits, it us easy, do you will be better oriented in prices and no concern about unpleassnt "mustakes" from the sellers side ))

reviews.title: Authentic Egypt shopping
reviews.text: In the old town area so it's an adventure if you are accustomed to arriving by tourist bus and being hand held for tours - it's crazy, crowded, and a jumble of fruit, vegetables, meat, and everything in between.  I was with an arabic speaker so that helped since this isn't Sheraton street and you will be met with blank but friendly stares if you are trying to negotiate in English at many of the stands - until a teenager helps out!  It's real folks so expect the stray cats and mess of a real market - it's messy and yes, there are flies and all the rest of it but hello - it's amazing and you seriously MUST VISIT!!!

reviews.title: One of the best dives in the Red Sea
reviews.text: This is probably (for me anyway) the best day boat dive from Hurghada, we went with cave Divers and had a wonderful dive. Some of the best coral you will see anywhere and the usual abundance of fish, Moray eels etc. Needs to be a calm day as it's a bit exposed compared with some of the other sites.

reviews.title: Divers Paradise
reviews.text: Dived with Dive star and this place is must dive for divers as you might see a lot of marine life under water especially if you do afternoon dive.

reviews.title: Hurghada Diving at its best.
reviews.text:
Most of the dive sites are very close to hurghada itself and so the boats trip,s are short but the diving is excellent. Yes, Its all shallow but it‚Äôs a very safe for learning.
I mainly use two small companies Funny Diver,s and New Dino Diver,s both located on the front at Dahar. Both are very friendly but Funny Diver,s have the better boat but its too popular, so I like New Dino Dive boats because sometimes its like a private hire with only a few divers on board. Both serve very good lunch and cake after the second dive.
Both highly recommended.

reviews.title: Dive
reviews.text: Great place to dive. Make sure you have a reputable dive courier who knows the area, history and reefs.

reviews.title: Fantastic Dive site
reviews.text:
Dived it with Dive Point Hurgarda in 2014 and again this year
   Great site with lots of life and colerfull corals..

reviews.title: awesome place to dive
reviews.text: it is like taking a walk around a beautifully manicured estate garden.  the corals are beautiful and in pristine condition, plenty of fish and wildlife, feather tails and turtles seen here.

reviews.title: Since 1990
reviews.text:
I have been diving Carless Reef since 1990. It has always been an amazing dive spot.
It is also a very important place for scientific research since it was completely eaten alive in 1995 by the Crown Of Thorns Star Fish. and has now re-grown to amazing abundance as it used to be.

Carless reef proves how resilient the red Sea corals are and how fast they can re grow.

reviews.title: Best experience with Bon Voyage Tours, Hurghada
reviews.text:
Greetings from Romania!

We recently returned from a wonderful vacation in Egypt, Hurghada. It was the first time for us. I have previously read travel reviews on the internet, where I found useful information. This way we got in touch with the manager of the local tourism agency Bon Voyage Tours Hurghada, Mr. Medo Fateem. A few days prior to our arrival, we contacted him via WhatsApp, so that everything was arranged in advance. We wanted to go on some local trips, so he was very kind and prompt to send us a price list (in Hurghada we realized that their prices are half compared to the other agencies).
We chose three trips, asked him to book us for them, and we met in front of our resort. He personally came to the meeting, handed us the tickets, and made sure we had all the information we needed. After each trip he contacted us, to make sure everything was ok. We were pleasantly surprised by his professionalism, hospitality and fairness.
We decided to go to Paradise Island, Glass Boat and Moto Safari, all with the transfer from the resort to the location included in the price.
The excursion to one of the islands, at Paradise beach, involved traveling by boat to the island, where we spent 4 amazing hours, in which we went snorkeling with the crew (they provided equipment),sunbathing, bath in the sea, and ate at the restaurant on the island (buffet). We watched on the island a traditional dance performance. The landscapes and colors are spectacular, the corals and fish are wonderful, very pleasant atmosphere the entire day.
The Glass Boat trip was done with a glass-walled ship, and you could enjoy the flora and fauna of the Red Sea, and a snorkeling session at the end.
We mostly enjoyed Moto Safari, where we drove ATVs through the desert, to the Bedouin village, we ride the camel, and we had a tea and a shisha with them.
All trips were more than affordable and we paid the right price for them, choosing the mentioned agency.
We intend to return to Egypt to visit the pyramids and the Valley of the Kings. We didn't have enough time for that.
We have spent many vacations in Greece, in different islands, but Egypt is special and unique, from many points of view.
It is a safe destination, despite the problems in the past, and I recommend you to go with all my heart!

reviews.title: Awful
reviews.text: I‚Äôve been coming to El Gouna for 16 years now and we‚Äôve always had pleasant experiences here. This trip was our first after Covid and we were so looking forward to it. This was our last day and the staff at the beach left a nasty taste in my mouth. We came over from Hill Villas where we are staying, across the bridge and my wife and I crossed with no issue. Our 4 daughters were a minute or so behind us, we suddenly received a panicked call from them saying they were effectively ‚Äúbeing detained‚Äù and couldn‚Äôt go any further. In addition, 1 hotel worker was then extremely rude, demanding they call us immediately and have us ‚Äúhurry‚Äù back. We were already down the jetty when we got the call and came back as swiftly as we could but still these people harried our children into calling us and demanding we came back quicker. Once back were informed we were ‚Äúbreaking the rules‚Äù and ordered to pay 100LE each or leave! Not pleasant at all‚Ä¶‚Ä¶.people should be ashamed to talk To my children like that!

reviews.title: Awful
reviews.text: We have been coming to el gouna for years we have always been greeted nicely from the staff and never had to pay a fee. However, when we got there today our parents were allowed straight through but me and my sisters aging from 16-20 were stopped and were spoken to rudely by the entrance staff saying we had to pay and entry fee. We tried to explain to them are parents had already gone through and our auntie had an owners card. They kept telling us that we need to call our parents even though it costs us a lot of money. In the end we called our parents we told the staff there coming. 5 minutes later one of the staff members told us they need to hurry up. When they got there the staff were also rude to them saying they need to pay they wouldn‚Äôt let them explain that our auntie had and owners card and we should and have always been let on the beach. Very Very disappointed by the service of the staff here as we have always been greeted with welcoming arms by other staff around el gouna.

reviews.title: WOUNDERFUL GOUNA BEACH

reviews.title: Beautifull but dirty
reviews.text: The beach is really beautifull! But please clean up! Everywhere are sigarettes sticking at your feet, and my son almost stepped in the sharp metal lip of a beercan. We‚Äôve took the first boat back.

reviews.title: Pleasure

reviews.title: Milkshakes & wooden bridge
reviews.text: There a really good milkshakes and smoothies on zeytunabeach! Cozy walk over the sea on the long wooden bridge! :-)

reviews.title: Practical  shuttle boat access
reviews.text: Enjoyed staying at the beach and having lunch there also; either for a relaxing afternoon or after one of the outings offered by Coral Tours. Our advice is to have shoes to go in the water as there are coral debris on the sand

reviews.title: Mid-range
reviews.text:
Staff is great but I think the place needs more care in terms of the beach setup itself.

name: Lax Gym
ranking_subcategory: #29 of 55 things to do in Hurghada

ranking: #29 of 55 things to do in Hurghada
description: LAX, El Gouna‚Äôs exclusive health and fitness club, introduces a new concept of wellbeing to the town. Located in the New Marina, the exclusive health club offers s stunning view of the Red Sea‚Äôs turquoise waters, giving you the perfect view during your daily workout.The health club offers a wide variety of state-of-the-art equipment, as well as numerous indoor and outdoor activities.

reviews.title: The best massage in town!
reviews.text: I booked a Thai massage session with poppy. She is magnificent. Her technique is no different from professional masseuses in Thailand. It was so good that I had to book again. The second time I stayed for 2.5 hrs! You just don't want her to stop :)

reviews.title: Best gym in Hurghada area
reviews.text: Very clean great music & juices. Very modern equipment. Helpful staff great views. Very quiet as no one was around!

reviews.title: Great way to while away a hot Gouna day
reviews.text: I'm a total convert to fitness vacations after begrudgingly visiting this gym with a friend. Undoubtedly, they have the best space and equipment I've seen for a Gym in Egypt, and much cleaner and more spacious than any Gold's or other franchise in the country. Their classes are pretty hard core, including Daniella's total body workout, and their view of the Red Sea is to die for. Classes or Gym access cost 100LE for a day, or you can sign up for a 12 class bundle for 700LE. Their spa also functions as a changing room, so you have a lovely shower and steam room waiting for you post workout. I'd highly recommend this place if you're trying to stay in shape while on holiday.

reviews.title: LAX GYM is The Gym you wanted to be in your hole life
reviews.text: In LAX GYM you can get back to life with Hadeel and Nirvana. This is the place you go broken and tired and go out a new person full of energy.

reviews.title: Fantastic experience
reviews.text: Had a really good workout, nice people they really know there stuff, the view was great as well! I have recommended many friends to go there and they have all had a great time

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.text: Fantastic juice bar. Great equipment. Superb location. Definitely worth a visit. By far the best gym in the Hurghada area.

reviews.title: Loved it!
reviews.text: This place is very serious about fitness - top of the line equipment, capable trainers, great classes. The setting is fantastic, with floor-to-ceiling views of the beach as you run on the treadmill. The place is clean and attractive. On the whole, a very positive experience!

reviews.title: LAX Gym (Gouna Red Sea Egypt)
reviews.text: A very nice gym with an amazing direct view of the Red Sea. It was very motivating and felt good to have this one awesome view of the beach while running on the treadmill. Overall, a Clean gym with a variety of machines/equipment and friendly front-desk staff.

reviews.title: Gym with a view...and much more.
reviews.text: Great selection of classes, well equipped gym and world class instructors- best spinning classes ever! Staff are extremely friendly and helpful. Very clean spa and changing/shower rooms.

reviews.title: High quality and friendly fitness gym.
reviews.text: Lax Gym is a high quality fitness gym with beautiful interior and an amazing view at the beach. The hosts are very friendly and invited me to stay in their nice lounge for some hours for getting my emails done. Free WLAN is not very usual in El Gouna. Thank you!
