name: Hurghada Museum
ranking_subcategory: #25 of 55 things to do in Hurghada
subcategory_ranking: #25 of 55 things to do in Hurghada
ranking: #25 of 55 things to do in Hurghada
description: Egypt Civilization Now in Hurghada Get Ready to enjoy one of the most amazing historical tours in Hurghada . or in All Egypt. Now and for the first time in Hurghada, Red Sea you can explore the Egyptian civilization from different ages just in one place , Hurghada Museum. Hurghada Museum is not only the first antiquities museum in al‚ÄëBahr al‚ÄëAhmar (Red Sea) Governorate, but also the first museum that is the result of a joint project between the Ministry of Tourism and Antiquities, al‚ÄëBahr al‚ÄëAhmar (Red Sea) Governorate, and the private sector. The Museum endeavors to emphasize beauty across different historical periods in Egyptian history. It will present this theme to visitors in an appropriate manner through the means of an attractive museum scenario. The museum‚Äôs themes are as diverse as the manifestations of beauty in Egyptian history. The Egyptian artists brought out the beauty highlighted in their environment and culture in accordance with their artistic vision.

offer_list.title: Hurghada Museum & City Tour With Private transportation - Hurghada
Amazing Hurghada City Tour with Hurghada Museum

reviews.title: Mauro tours 5* experience
reviews.text: Great experience with Mauro tours from Pharoah Azur beach resort! The museum is full of interesting artefacts, so easy to get lost in the history and spend a few hours there. Definitely recommend the private tour option with Mauro. Was great to experience Egypt like a local! Highly recommend, he‚Äôs a great host!

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.text:
Worth to see it. Very intresting ithems in there. English signages around but better have a guide who knows much more about exhibits and also can answer your questions. 
I had a tour with Mauro and he is amaizng. Really recommend.

reviews.title: Well worth a visit
reviews.text:
The museum at Hurghada is well worth a visit. The museum is a modern and well designed complex. The exhibits are very impressive and there's artifacts and mummies with informative descriptions in both Arabic and English. We had an enjoyable few hours there with Mauro Tours from Pharaoh Azur hotel with our 3 children (12, 10 & 5) and they enjoyed it very much. The gift shop is in the form of a small mall with a large selection of gift items and there's no high pressure selling. There's no toilet paper in the toilets so bring your own, in case you're 5 year does a poo in the visitors toilets. One of the very friendly shop staff came to our rescue with a packet of tissues! Top man!

Well worth a visit if you're in the area.

reviews.title: I spent good day
reviews.text: The museum exhibits were interesting. There were also modern ones. Honest prices in museum shop. Friendly service.

reviews.title: Interesting and informative
reviews.text: Most of the displays have english signage so no real need for a guide. So interesting and the artifacts are amazing.

reviews.title: Well designed museum
reviews.text: Small with well displayed items.  Some stunning Tut tomb pieces.  Not crowded.  Variety of shops in the complex, but an expensive morning.  Check opening times.

reviews.title: Good Museum. Conned in the shop.
reviews.text: The museum has some great things to see, definitely worth a visit. There is also a lovely new shopping mall where we browsed the goods with a, seemingly, very helpful man. On our return to the UK we found our item was not the one we had chosen, it had been broken, glued together and then fractured. The glue can clearly be seen so not not broken in transit, so just be aware!

reviews.title: Great little museum!
reviews.text: Although, the museum is not huge, there are lots of things to see and plenty of information accompanying the exhibits, in both Egyptian and English. What I didn't expect was there were exhibits from later Egyptian times, all too often you think of Egyptian history as only about the Pharaohs. There is a bit of a tourist Mall to go through when you enter and exit the museum. Depending how much you want to read and take in, you need a minimum of 1 hour. We happily spent a couple of hours there.

reviews.title: AMAZING MUSEUM + TAXI DRIVER
reviews.text: Some 5000years old mammies can be seen here! Although it is not big and perfect but it is worth seeing the museum. Besides i have got the right taxi provider for my trip. He is Mohamed. He is honest, humble and he keeps to promises. Always prompt to all bookings. Most importantly is i have been out all week with so many different taxi rides, his car is the most adequate car to provide services unlike others. Always very clean car and it is new. Anyone who loves to have a safe trip in hurghada may contact him through WhatsApp @ +201026376372. Never try local taxi as lots of them are so pushy and they charges 3 to 4 times the price. I know Mohamed through uber. Tour operators arrangment from airport to hotels in hurghada also charged well too much. I wished i knew him a lot earlier. Mohamed is the best taxi driver you can trust in hurghada if you like to have a safe and happy trip!

reviews.title: Taste of Ancient Egypt
reviews.text: Dear tourists, I honestly do not understand why this place is not promoted and mentioned by travel agencies in meetings with clients after arriving in Hurghada. For me, Hurghada museum is an institution that you should definitely not miss in this resort. A few basics before you dive into exploring artifacts from the history of Ancient Egypt, the Ptolemaic period to almost the present day. Don't be alarmed, the museum is on the first floor of the shopping center and is wheelchair accessible by elevator. When I was here on the 11/2022 tour, the opening hours were divided as follows: 10:00 - 13:00, 17:00 - 22:00. Another thing I would like to mention is the entrance fee, you can buy it in advance through the museum's website, but it will cost you more than on the spot. You can buy it in the museum for 200 EGP, and on the website for 350 EGP. ATTENTION! Payment for tickets is only possible in cash. In any case, student discounts are recognized and therefore ISIC with you. On the sidelines, I would also like to mention the local shopping arcade, the things here are of good quality and at fixed prices with a single cash register at the exit, cash and card payments are accepted here, unlike the museum, and if there  is something here that you will definitely not find in shops elsewhere, it is the Carina stand - a brand of cotton home clothes and linen at very reasonable prices.

reviews.title: full of broken glass, needs someone to keep the place safe and tidy
reviews.text: Amazing in what bad conditions this place is. You pay 150 LE (8 EUR) for a day. The indoor area is OK but the outdoor area is really messy. It took me 2 min. to collect 2 hands full of broken glass in the sand were the kids play. It seems nobody cares at all about that place. I gave it to the staff and what happened. Nothing. The staff sits there and plays with mobile phones. If I would be the boss, I would kick them out right away and employ someone who keeps the place safe and tidy. Minigolf 3 out of 4 are are completely broken. Very sad to see this nice place in such a bad shape.

reviews.title: Kids had fun
reviews.text: Great place to take the kids if it gets too hot for them, air conditionied and a cup of coffee available if you ask

reviews.title: The Miniature Golf course isn't in the best of shape!
reviews.text:
We had an hour to kill one afternoon so popped in there for a fun game of crazy golf.
I'm not saying that the place is derelict but the individual holes are in really really poor shape with the artificial grass/turf being ripped, torn and  - often - missing entirely.
We picked up a bit of litter when we were walking in  but there was a *lot* of rubbish lying about  the place.  We mentioned it politely to the two guys there but they weren't particularly interested in doing anything about it.
They charged us 100 LE each fto play golf which was an absolute rip off :) :)

reviews.title: Very good place for kids
reviews.text: This place is excellent for young kids to spend their time and energy it is a large place with many games , but it closes at 9 o'clock

reviews.title: Excellent place for the children to safely play
reviews.text: Really great fun was had by all of the children. All inside so no problems with the sun. Also they have special events and markets from time to time. See their Facebook page for details.

reviews.title: Friendly staff
reviews.text:
We went half hour before losing and they were nice enough to let us in.
The games and the place were super clean and the kids had so much fun.

reviews.title: Fun with my grandchildren
reviews.text: We took out grandchildren here to play on the crazy golf and then went in the indoor play area, they had a wonderful time and played with everything including the trampoline and the obstacle play area. We had trouble getting them out as they were having so much fun, very inexpensive for the time there.

reviews.title: good safe place for the kids to play
reviews.text: This is a really good safe place for the kids to chill out and play safely. They also hold regular themed events here which the kids are  encouraged to join in with so if there is an event on it's a MUST to go along and join in. FUN for ALL

reviews.title: great place for kids to let off steam
reviews.text: Really good place for children to scream and shout and enjoy themselves.  They also hold special markets a few times a year.  Very clean and helpful staff.  Also the toilets are clean a first for Egypt

reviews.title: Very poor
reviews.text: Very poor my son did not like it. My son is 7 years old. 60 pounds for one hour. My son refused to stay more than 20 minutes. I could not even leave my son alone as there was no one inside with us. It seems that no workers except the ticketing lady.

offer_list.title: Scuba diving:

reviews.title: Awesome dive with DiveMania
reviews.text: By far the best dive ive done. The water was super clear and the aquatic life was elegant. Madsive Moray eels, Blue spotted stingrays and more.

reviews.title: Wonderful
reviews.text: Wonderful reef. Well worth diving if you are either on a liveaboard or day boat. We dived it mid afternoon and the reef was teeming with marine life

reviews.title: Small Aquarium in the centre of Hurgada.
reviews.text: Visited as part of a small afternoon trip from the hotel which was resonably priced. Worth a visit many spectacular fishes, and turtles. Toilets clean.

reviews.title: Extraordinary snorkeling
reviews.text: Excellent snorkeling at this reef.  Incredible variety of fish.  Very vibrant coral.  Lots to see.  Only about an hour by boat from Hurghada Marina.  Can get crowded, but mostly with divers who don‚Äôt affect the snorkeling.  Good place to go even if the wind is blowing from the north.  Highly recommended.

reviews.title: Heaven!
reviews.text: Definitely dive/snorkel here. It is phenomenal. We saw lion fish, stone fish, octopus, Morays, rays, snakes. It was the best reef we visited.

reviews.title: an amazing collection
reviews.text: well worth a vist although a little expensive, saw fish I ahve never seen before and it has been well disgned and very interesting to walk round on different levls and not just glass aqauariums. Also has birds animals and reptiles.

reviews.title: Beautiful Reefs
reviews.text: It was very nice to dive there, Beautiful Reefs, its shallow dive and also there is another part which deeper for the certified divers.

reviews.title: Nice reef where is still something to discover ..
reviews.text: We are diving there several years. And we still like this very nice reef full of corals and fishes. It is easy shallow dive (approx. 10 m) even for beginners. Nicer diving is a little aside from main "parking lot" of the boats (by Zodiac). Sometimes it is crowded because of short distance from Hurghada. But it is worth for it.

reviews.title: A Diving spot not to miss
reviews.text: I happened to be diving for about 8 years and I can assure you that for 6 years I was lucky to be diving in this spot, not that it is a very nice spot but the nice thing is that every time I dive there I am lucky to see something new, it's amaizing how does the sea changes the look of the corals and the fish in a very simple but strange way, which I should say "lucky us" it's like visiting a place and find out that it was painted and re-decorated everytime you go there, I have never been borred diving there, and think I will go there again next time.

reviews.title: Beautiful reef - beautiful fishes
reviews.text: Quite shallow diving site, from 10 meters sandy bottom. Nice pinnacles and main reef. You can see there lots of beautiful fishes: Scorpinfishes, morays, rays, lot of nice yellow goatfishes, porcupinefishes, nudibranches.... You can make several different dives there.

reviews.title: Beautiful place
reviews.text: We have just got back from 5 springs aqua park we absolutely loved it here, staff are friendly and life guards do a great job, bar staff walk around with drinks so you don‚Äôt need to go to the bar, only soft drinks. The beach is beautiful and the water is so clear. We really did have the best holiday there and wouldn‚Äôt go anywhere else. The hotel is well looked after and clean, the cleaners are lovely and do a good job with the rooms, fresh towels and bedding everyday. I would highly recommend this hotel to anyone visiting Egypt. It really is a lovely place

reviews.title: Absolutely brilliant time had by all
reviews.text: Had an amazing 2 weeks at 5 springs aqua park. I stayed at golden 5 club and used the aqua park every day. Lifeguards are friendly and very safety conscious my kids like to push their luck. Used the snack bar for lunch every day food was lovely and fresh cooked as you ordered. Mr Omar and Miss Monika were very welcoming and made sure we had the best days. Will definitely be returning next year so much to do kept us all occupied.

reviews.title: Excellent service and meaning of relaxation
reviews.text:
Polite staff and very comfort place,
Amazing aqua park ,
Wonderful coral, 
Safety and helpful staff 
Should visit this place to discover amaz  part of Hurghada

reviews.title: Wonderful
reviews.text: It‚Äôs highly recommended for whoever is looking for a quiet and clean place for relaxing and having fun

reviews.title: Brilliant
reviews.text: Absolutely loved our time at the 5 springs Aqua park staff are friendly and lifeguards are on the ball. Aqua park is clean with lots to do. The barmen walk around handing out soft drink so polite and saves you a trip to the bar. The views are beautiful and the beach is gorgeous walk in crystal clear water. Perfect for snorkelling. There is a snack bar serving 1-2 is light snacks chips etc then from 3-4 serving pizza and 4-4.30 sweets/crepes. Would highly recommend a trip here especially good for children.

reviews.title: Had the best time and still have 10 more days
reviews.text: Brilliant aqua park I have only been here 24 hours and I am loving it lifeguards are so friendly same as the bar staff food on the beach is great to fill a hole chips burger pizza. All delicious and freshly cooked. Thanks to Mr Omar b for making us feel so welcome. Wave pool is brilliant massive waves unlike other parks I have been too. The slides are massive the best one is the 3 racing ones. I will defo be back next year

reviews.title: Happy days in a funny place
reviews.text: The aquapark it's really good and one of the best things in the hotel, we love to go there every morning and really cool staff and polite and m,omar one of the gentleman's that we really like him with his great attitude...anybody go to golden five hotels have to go to aquapark and enjoy there

reviews.title: Joy and happiness in aquapark
reviews.text: It was really happy times in the aquapark and me and my family was extremly happy and they are all so nice and helpful, the slides are so cool and we recommend this aquapark for anyone come to golden 5 hotel..

reviews.title: Wwwwoooooowwwww
reviews.text: The aqua park it's very wow for us it was so lovely and enjoyable my wife was so happy and the staff was so  nice with us and it was really fun and nice to remember

reviews.title: Great place

reviews.title: third best beach in Hurghada
reviews.text: All in all, the place is okay. The staff is friendly and also informs you about all the rules and helps you find the place. However, I personally found the beach area with sand too small and the sunbeds stacked too close to each other. I also find it a shame that you can't take anything in with you in terms of pick-nicks or drinks. For people who work and live in Egypt, the entrance fee of 300 LE is also a bit high.

reviews.title: if you don't care who you will meet go and you will be happy
reviews.text: I used to go always to it since I figure out that they don't have face control there, anyone who has money can enter dream beach, i met someone there which I don't know how they let him enter there, he is a worker who is painting flats, I shocked that he saw me with my swimming suit since that time I can not go there, restaurants there are okay

reviews.title: Rude and not professional!
reviews.text:
Service is not the best at all, and the people specially at the doors they were actually rude, the beach is good , but again the people are rude and not professional at all. 
i don‚Äôt not recommend this beach, most probably if they changed the staff or taught them to be more professional then it would be better

reviews.title: Great for a day at the beach
reviews.text: Friendly staff, good security and life guard on watch. Nice sun beds and clean water. Only downside is that the drinks selection are very limited. They didn‚Äôt even have something like fresh juice, ice coffee was overpriced for the low quality. It‚Äôs not a luxurious place at all, and everything looks slightly old but it‚Äôs great for a day at the beach to relax and tan.

reviews.title: Nice Beach
reviews.text:
- The Dream Beach is relaxing and nice place to go.
- It depends when did you go and had your experience, if its a busy day, holiday or during holidays.
- If there is a party.
- I went in different times  and every time has its own spark.
- You pay for the entrance and towel and choosing a sunbed that one of the staff helps you or you do it by your self.
- The most important thing is that you will have the sunbathing and nice swim in the red sea what ever he day is or even the season. 
- Its nice experience

reviews.title: Never again! Worst service ever!
reviews.text: I‚Äôve been here for several times, but never experienced such a bad service like today! First nobody came for around 30 minutes, after we asked for the menu, it tooks again around 30 minutes until we received it and after nobody came back. We went to the bar to order something, the staff could understand anything as they‚Äôre not speaking English. It was definitely my last time here and the place isn‚Äôt worth the price!

reviews.title: Nice Relaxing beach
reviews.text: Very nice beach been many many times always seem to return here but the price needs to be clear Because every time I go they change the price should stay one price all year or two at least for the summer months but every time I‚Äôve last been it‚Äôs been something new every time, however I always seem to return to this beach good food good spa.

reviews.title: Worst place - just a nightmare
reviews.text:
We went to dreambeach 4 years ago, when it was decent. So we came back 3 days ago. We paid 150 pound each. When we came to the sunbeds we saw that all were extremely dirty - as if they didn't clean it for at least 2 years. The dust/sand was just on all the mattress (who were supposed to be white but were brown). The sunbeds were partly broken and it's wood were rotten! After 10 min I called the waiter for the menu, I got a dirty, broken one with an unfriendly waiter. We just left after 20 min. On our way out we told the cashier about the unacceptable dirtines. His reply was that it's the system and pretended to be shocked that it was dirty. Then he told us very impolitely: it's dream beach - the best one in Hurghada. 
Well I hope for Hurghada that it's not, because it's just horrible!

My advise is not to go - you will only find yourself in an expensive nightmare!

reviews.title: Expensive and terrible service
reviews.text: The first time we went there we payed EGP 100 a person including 0,5 ltr water. The service was outstanding, the second time the water was not inclluded, the third and last time we had to pay EGP 150 a person, without water and a very terrible service. The first beers came in an ice cooler with small bags potato chips, the second order of beer was trown in the icecooler wich only contended then almost warm water, no clean drinkingglasses. The order for one portion french fries took over 50 minutes and served cold, I didn‚Äôt accept that, they charged the fries, no way I payed them, they didn‚Äôt get a tip also. In totaal with entrence for 4 hours just the 2 of us 2 coffees, 4 beers and 2 waters we payed far over EGP 1200. So this was the last time we went there.

reviews.title: Nightmare beach
reviews.text:
The place is drab, shoddy and just grim. 
We had spent a week out on the red sea and had to spend the day waiting round, unfortunately this meant a day at the so called "Dream Beach". 

There is literally nothing to do other than sit in the sun. We ordered food an hour in advance which arrived late and wrong which included a vegan pizza being brought out consisting of 4 pieces of bread and the plate being thrown onto the table by staff exclaiming "how can you eat this?"

The only redeeming feature of the beach is that I got to leave to come back to the UK. 

Do not go to Dream Beach.

reviews.title: Summer holiday

reviews.title: Amazing beach a real paradise
reviews.text: we visited the Carnival Sharm El Arab and we could not believe the colors of the fish and coral we have seen. Its a dream to swim and snorkel in this area, sea water temperature was nice and warn, unspoiled corals and colorful fish. My kids told me that they feel like we are in a movie. Beach was very nice and clean, food was good. Entertainment team was just amazing. We look forward to be back in April. Thank you to all this great team that made us a memorable family day.

reviews.title: I is a shame!
reviews.text: After a great search on the internet, I wanted to visit some places in Hurghada in order to make snorkelling in different places than my hotel. It is a shame and discrase that they dont have the beaches open for the people to visit and enjoy them as they want. I payed 150 LE to take a taxi over there and take me back afterwards, and when I wanted to reach the place, the only way was through the Red Taj Mahal hotel, where they asked me 20 euro per person to visit the place! with 40 euros I could have booked a room over there, but the comments on the internet are not flattering! Of course I didnt give them the oportunity to robb me! I prefered to go to Sharm el Naga instead which has an amazing snorkelling spot with enormus live corals where you see the red sea life as it was in the past! Shame on you!

reviews.title: Interesting experience
reviews.text:
We were offered a free guided tour by a rep in our hotel to see some Egyptian history. We weren't really sure where it was we were going or what the tour was of. So it was a bit of a surprise when we arrived to find that it was what seemed like a papyrus shop in a largely run down area! Once that initial feeling was out of the way, we really enjoyed the visit as we were shown how papyrus is made and the stories in the images were brought to life, the traditional calendar explained and so many anecdotal stories were told. The guide was knowledgeable and answered all of our questions. 
Our children, 9&5, were interested in the making of the papyrus and our daughter is taking her pictures that she bought into school to tell her friends all about it. As it was a free tour, and we were driven there from the hotel and back without charge, we did feel there was an expectation that we would buy something. 
All in all it was an interesting visit and worth going, but be prepared to make a purchase of something which will serve as a lasting reminder of your holiday.

reviews.title: Beautiful papyrus
reviews.text: The owner gave us a short but very informative talk on how papyrus is used in the making of some beautiful and colourful "pictures". Prices to suit all pockets and a chance to buy something truly authentically Egyptian.

reviews.title: Incredible tour guide,  great service and value for money
reviews.text: I visited Hurghada for a week away with my  sister and Grandma (both wheelchair bound)  I was very worried about booking any trips due to their disabilities and reliability of their chairs but someone recommended Aladdin at Canary Tours so we gave him a go.  He was INCREDIBLE, Aladdin treated them both like queen's and ensured that all of the trips we went on were accessible,  any that weren't, he made possible! We took several trips including Parasailing, Quad Biking, Old City, Senzo Mall, A private glass bottom boat including 1 snorkeling stop and the VIP orange Bay trip which included 2 Snorkeling stops. We booked the VIP orange Bay as a surprise for my Grandma's birthday - Aladdin arranged for the boat to be decorated for the way back, everyone sung Happy birthday and he arranged an amazing cake to make it extra special. I can't wait to use Aladdin again in the near future.

reviews.title: Highly recommended dive center!!!
reviews.text:
Highly recommended dive center!!!

As a diving couple (PADI Advanced & Nitrox) we booked 5 daily dive trips with 2 dives a day.

The crew is very friendly, they will offer you the best service possible and assist you very well.

The diving equipment is very well maintained and the organization is very professional in every way.
All the dives, tank volumes, nitrox values are properly documented for their company administration.

The dive master Midu is a very good dive master who is very friendly and has good communication skills for preparing each dive  with a good briefing about the dive site.

By request you can plan a dive site that suits your needs and skills. (Depending on the route and fellow passengers on the boat)

The lunch during the daily dive trips is very good and upon request they provided great vegetarian meals for us.

Hope to be back soon!

reviews.title: Excellent Fixed Price Shopping
reviews.text:
A fantastic shopping place. You wouldn't go out of your way to go there-it's big, not massive and is just one shop-but as it's almost opposite my hotel-Panorama Bungalows, near the Hawaii-it's a fab shop.
All prices are fixed and very reasonable. They sell everything there from a wide variety of pops and snacks, loads of souvineers, Cigarettes (sleeves also), sun cream, toiletries, everything you need really. You will find clothes ect on the first floor. It's not a vast array of items, but worth a look. Also a good way to see how much items should be going for if you went into the centre of Hurghada, where there is so much more shops.
Overall, a fab shopping place to get all your bits and bobs and I'll definitely be back during my holiday.

reviews.text: A taxi driver that collected us from our hotel said this was the best place "ever" to go shopping,"they had everything and the prices were very very good and no one would hassle or pressure us. We agreed to go. When we pulled up to this place after about 20 mins of driving we were ushered into a big shop and give 2 tickets and a guide (human) he said he would walk us round the store and there was no pressure to buy, but then said how could we not want to buy anything in there ,you couldn't pick anything up without it been taken out of your hand and asked how many do your u want. We were rushed through the store as it was closing (we arrived at 7:50pm & shut at 8;00pm) .it was one of the most surreal situations we've ever been in and couldn't wait to get out of there. We will never go back .

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.text:
Booked airport transfer from home, the taxi was Waiting for us outside the airport.

Booked a Safari tour to Hurghada dessert, with camelriding. All went very good. A lot of Other turist in the dessert, but they where in Big groups. 
It was very Nice to go with Hurghada taxi transfer as we where going only as a familie. We didnt have to Wait for others. The driver was very frindly, and did his best to answer all our questions. It was a good day. We went 3 adult, 3 kids (2-4-6 years).

The day we had to leave, the driver picked us up from the hotel in good time.

All drivers were very frindly. Lorraine was very Quick to answers e-mail, even i Odd times.
All in all a good trip to Hurghada, Thanks Hurghada taxi transfers.

reviews.title: Great service
reviews.text: Excellent service, the drivers picked us up on time and were very friendly. We will be happy to do another booking when we return to Hurghada next year.

reviews.title: Highly recommended
reviews.text: Excellent communication, friendly drivers, highly recommended. This was our second transfer, as always on time and helpful.

reviews.title: Excellent Airport Transfer
reviews.text: Excellent service for our airport transfer on 27th Feb. Driver was outside with our name clearly written on his board. His vehicle was modern and clean. He was very funny, and informative, without going over the top. Will use again if returning to Hurghada.

reviews.title: Fantastic service as usual
reviews.text:
I have used this company several times. The driver recognised us at the airport which meant that we didn‚Äôt have to look for him. He pulled our cases to the taxi. The taxi was immaculately clean. The driver, Allah, was a careful driver but not slow. For the return trip we had the same driver who arrived early to pick us up. His English is limited but sufficiently good for us to communicate and understand each other.
Regarding the booking there is never a problem as Lorraine is English so communication is excellent and the price is good. During the holiday she contacted us via what‚Äôs app to arrange our pick up time and is flexible if we wanted to change it.
The service, as usual was superb. I would not consider using any other company when visiting Hurghada. They are 100per cent reliable snd I thoroughly recommend them.

reviews.title: Amazing service and a great taxi
reviews.text:
We booked 2 airport with Hurghada Taxi Transfers and the promptness & easiness of booking was amazing. The service before, during and after confirms the professionalism. The drivers are very friendly, super helpful with luggage, the cars are very clean and the ride was very smooth.
Despite a 6 hour delay of our flight the driver was on time and checked on us to ensure our flight went smoothly. The pick up sign is easy to spot in the meet and greet area. 
We can highly recommend their service, the price is fair, service is outstanding and we are looking forward to our next trip with Hurghada Taxi Transfers!

reviews.title: Excellent Airport Taxi Service
reviews.text: Via internet I made a reservation for a transfer from Hurghada AirPort to Hotel Premier Le Reve in Sahl Hasheesh. Upon arrival, the driver was waiting in the hall with a name sign. He has neatly loaded the suitcases into the taxi. When we got in there were two bottles of chilled water waiting for us. Whatsapp great service. The taxicar was very clean. The driver drove calmly. The return transfer was also excellent.

reviews.text:
Was on a Day trip with family & kids 
First boat was very small according to Covid 19 rules & captain was driving very fast as if it‚Äôs a boat competition 
I was Very surprised üòÆ as one other big boat come close to use & our boat was shaking very strongly with the wind 
Ice cream üç¶ was our big concern 
It was offered for kids for free on lunch time & we thought it‚Äôs free & when my small boy went to the bar ask for additional one they gave him one & didn‚Äôt mention it‚Äôs for free then after that we find the price was writing on the back of the cheque and for 2 icream it was 100 pounds üòÇüòÇ 
The cashier wanted to find an excuse for not writing the price on the cheque & write on the back & not bring the original check for us that it‚Äôs because I can pay without any problem

reviews.title: Beautiful location....Clean place .....Average food...
reviews.text:
Have been there for an evening dining

Location is amazing with an outstanding view

Place is so clean with high standard hygiene 

Service is excellent

However, majority of the food dishes were tasty and yummy, except few ones

Expensive prices would have been expected - and appreciated - for such upmarket restaurant (one of very few in Hurghada), but dishes contains very small portion....an unacceptable way by the management/owner to maximise profitability

Would I go again?

I would surely do, at least will increase the number of dishes required for a decent proper dinner üòä

reviews.title: Very nice place with amazing views
reviews.text: I visited the place for dinner only , didn't use the beach and we had a very nice delicious dinner with amazing calm mode , nice view and helpful stuff.

reviews.title: Lovely private beach
reviews.text: Visited in early November 2019 - wanted a relaxing day.  We were staying in a VRBO apt with no beach access so this was perfect.  It's small but nice.  Good snorkeling with some nice corals but the swimming area itself is small - still large enough to get a good swim but easily explored. Large dock to allow the multiple boats with the off-shore snorkeling groups to depart and arrive at days beginning/ end.  Lovely place to watch the boats go up and down the coast.  Good sunbeds with enough space on the beach to have privacy.  Restaurant provides food/ drink.  Price to get in was 200le with a 200le food/drink minimum which is easily done if you have drinks on the beach and at least one meal.  Not sure why one reviewer thought it was for members only - we had no problem and were not "members".  ..we did have some push back at the gate but think it was a communication issue so we asked to speak to the manager and were welcomed.  Bring your water shoes - beach is sand but the waterline turns to small rocks and coral with a deep drop off 6-7 ' in...Clean bathrooms, two outside showers to wash off the salt and space to change at day's end.

reviews.title: Worst place in Hurghada
reviews.text: We visited the beach today and got told it‚Äôs for members only unless the beach is empty. There wasn‚Äôt one person on the beach. Nowhere on their website or Facebook page does it mention that it‚Äôs members only and the man at the gate was rude and unpleasant. To be honest the beach didn‚Äôt look like it‚Äôs worth the 200le entrance fee if you can get through the door. I suppose it‚Äôs all about if your face fits. Disgusting and I will make sure I‚Äôll pass on the news about this nasty place

reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE LOVE LOVE
reviews.text:
OMG this place is sooooo relaxing - great sunbeds - private beach - amazing food and fantastic staff!! 

Look forward to seeing you again in March and September!!!

reviews.title: Anf√§nger-Bewertung
reviews.text:
Es gibt drei Strecken:
1) Eine Anf√§ngerstrecke, wo man erst einmal (mit einem pers√∂nlichen Trainer) √ºben kann
2) Ein Strecke im Uhrzeigersinn
3) Eine Strecke gegen den Uhrzeigersinn

Da es meine erste Wakeboard-Erfahrung war und ich keinen Vergleich habe, kann ich nur das Folgende sagen: 

- Die Hilfestellung f√ºr Anf√§nger ist bei den l√§ngeren Strecken sehr unterschiedlich, da muss man Gl√ºck haben. 
- Das Wasser war (warum auch immer) deutlich k√§lter als im Meer.
- An manchen Ecken soll der Zug nich gleichm√§√üig sein, es ruckelt wohl.
- Es gibt Umkleiden und (hei√üe!) Duschen. 

An alle Nicht-Wakeboarder: 
Ist eine lustige Erfahrung, probiert es ruhig mal aus!

Sheko helped us book two amazing trips. He was friendly, not pushy and gave us the time we needed to decide. 

Abdo was our ‚Äòcaptain‚Äô both trips. He is so friendly, and made sure the children had an amazing experience! 

Moka was the one that helped us get over fears! The children were afraid of swimming in the see, but they all did it! Moka was funny and he knew what he was doing. I was swimming with dolphins thanks to him! 

So if you are in Hurghada, book your trips with Crazy Dolphin, they are awesome!

reviews.text:
As first time divers we chose Crazy Dolphin after reading the reviews before we even got to Egypt,  we were not disappointed,  the guys are so professional and care about your trio and experience,  we had a talk with the guy who would be diving with us and he explained all the parts and hand signals, the actual dive was something we will never forget, he held our hands the entire time and made sure we were both OK,
Red sea diving is a must, also they heard there were dolphins near, so we turned around and searched them, what a beautiful sight to see, the crew were as excited as us to see them, thank you so much to Nemo and is crew, Elaine and Steve (UK)

reviews.title: Airport transfer
reviews.text: Used Falcon for airport transfers. Professional, reliable, reasonably priced and very helpful staff. Easy to book through messenger. Have used before as solo passenger and as a family party and would not use any other company/

reviews.title: I give Falcon 5 stars
reviews.text:
Finally I can share my experience with Falcon
We planned to experience fun days on our holiday and before travelled  we contacted Siad to discuss our options 
We prebooked our airport transfer,boat trip to Orange Bay and the quad adventure. We were not asked for any deposit and even though we had done our research we thought what can we lose
Well we were met at the airport and our worries were put to rest
I can honestly say every aspect of our trips were organised with high professional detail 
We were contacted through out our stay to ensure were fully aware of pick up times etc
It was great what a friendly group of staff ,nothing was too much trouble and the cost was truly unbelievable 
Looking forward to our next Falcon experience

reviews.title: Fabulous trip
reviews.text:
Visited Hurghada in March 23 and booked Paradise Island with Falcon Adventure.  We heard great reviews before we arrived and we were not disappointed.  The trip was great value for money, price included soft drinks, lunch, stops to snorkel, water sports including banana boat and sofa surfing.  Our tour guide Amir was fantastic, he really looked after us and made sure we were having a great time. When we arrived at Paradise Island my son fell through the steps coming off the jetty and hurt his leg, Amir was really attentive and made sure his wounds were cleaned with first aid equipment as soon as we got back to the boat.

We also used the WiFi boxes from Falcon, connection was great and would recommend these also.  Said arranged for a rep to meet us at the hotel the day after we arrived and again on our last day.  Falcon were in contact with us throughout our stay which was great.

Would definitely recommend and will certainly book our trips with these again when we return.

reviews.title: Wow
reviews.text: Trip to Cairo was the best day ever. Treated like Queens,  pick up on time very knowledgeable guide and driver. Took to the best places including museum, boat trip on the nile..wow. pyramids were amazing.

reviews.title: Fantastic company in every way
reviews.text:
What can I say? These guys made our holiday! I didn't believe all the reviews, there was no way a company could be THAT good... Well they really are!
We did extreme quads and dolphin house with falcon (Zizi) and thw whole time was such a laugh and enjoyable,  they guys join in and are fantastic qith rhe kids.
I booked another 2 excursion with another company (because I honestly didn't expect falcon to be all that) and was gutted I didn't use Falcon for all of them. 
They were also great before booking, answering all my questions (and there were lots), ousting my mind at rest (first time in egypt) and just generally being really great guys.
We're already planning on returning to egypt as soon as finances allow and will 100% use Falcon for all trips.
Thank you again for making our holiday so memorable ü•∞

reviews.title: Day out in Cairo.
reviews.text:
Our family of 5 booked the Cairo by Air trip. We were picked up from Serenity and taken to the airport where we caught our flight to Cairo. We had an amazing day, and did the Nile boat trip which was an extra charge but worth it, and that turned out to be one of the highlights. Our guide was fabulous and nothing seemed too much trouble for him. He was knowledgeable and was able to share lots of information. It was a busy day, we packed in so much, but it was absolutely worth it. You do have a couple of stops where there is the option to buy things, but I didnt think this was too pressured, if you dont want to buy the items you jut say no politely and thats fine. 

Wouold defiitely do it again and would definitely book with Falcon again, was hassle free with no problems.

reviews.title: Great Transfers
reviews.text: We used Falcon for transfers to hotel and return to airport. Very punctual, comfortable car, excellent service at a reasonable cost   Highly recommended

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.text: 2 fab trips with falcon, orange bay and bedwian safari.  We will definitely be using them when we go again.

reviews.title: Water activities
reviews.text:
In the two week holiday in serenity beach hotel we used the centre for all water activities including boat trips and dives.
I ve done my padi open water course and my friends intro dives.
The master divers were extremely patient and caring with the new divers.
My course was well taught both theory and practical side a special thanks to Assad and Abdul into making me a better diver

First day of aowd.
For fun-dives its excellent.

reviews.title: Just awesome!
reviews.text: We made a boat trip in a small group and dived together with our dive guide GelGel. He was very open, welcome, funny and instructed us very well. He showed us very nice diving spots with a huge variety of fishes. We went for this Diving Center on recommendation of my family and we would definitely would come here again. Also I really recommend to join this dive Center by your next stay!

reviews.title: Diving
reviews.text:
Great dives thank you for nice time
Good crew nice lunce big fish many fun 
I like this country and the sea

reviews.title: Nice dive sites, great guides!
reviews.text:
I went on two boat trips with Master Divers. They have a really nice, big boat and everything on board you could possibly need. Very nice and helpful crew, great dive guides, knew the dive sites well and pointed out highlights during the dive.
Great experience, would recommend!

reviews.title: Amazing Dives in egypt
reviews.text:
Such nice dives!! Gel Gel was the best guide ever! Always would come back!

We saw lots of nice fish, stingrays and a octopus.

reviews.title: Good diving experience
reviews.text: It was a nice experience to dive in the Red Sea. Thanks to our guide Mahmoud and the whole crew for the past few days!

reviews.title: Whole new world
reviews.text: Gel Gel and his team was absolutely fantastic, family of 6 with 3 of diving and 3 snorkeling we all had an amazing time. Mu 12 year old first time diving was a little worried bit the team made it an amazing experience for him. Myself own experience was fantastic, second dive was like a whole new world. Thank you to all off you and will be back to do my Padi.

reviews.title: Fantastic days of diving.
reviews.text: Just had two days diving on My Master. The boat was good. The crew were excellent. Helping with all our equipment and meeting our needs The food was good too. Diving instructors were able to lead our group. I can highly recommend this centre.

description: Where clients come first. Where friendships are born. Simply the Best Diving Holidays. We were established in 1999. Safety, quality, excellent service and personal attention are our trademarks. Within Hurghada we provide all transfers free of charge, using our experienced and safe drivers. Dive guides are always plentiful and well educated. They speak your language! ‚Äì a must to perfectly understand all briefings and safety procedures. Divers are divided into small groups according to their experience. Our excellent crew keeps an eye on everything and is always there to help you. Our own boat ‚ÄúBasyl‚Äù differs from other daily diving boats in Hurghada. It has a big salon, an organized dive deck in Teak wood, clean toilets, a shower on the back deck and a luxurious sun deck with very comfortable pillows. It‚Äôs a boat for divers, designed by divers!

reviews.title: FAN-TAS-TIC!
reviews.text:
It was just a perfect experience! 

There was nothing missing!
From the beginning, the pick up at our residence for small amount extra due to the distance to our last dive, everything went smoothly!

Very friendly dive guides, clean practical boat, excellent captain, great food on board!
Helpfull flexible crew! Clean Full airtanks! 
Everything was there!

reviews.title: Great diving
reviews.text:
Been using blue paradise since 2019.we originally booked via the hotel rep as the dive centre in the hotel had closed.we now book direct .the boat is immaculate and the crew are super friendly
The instructors are great mustafa and Joan and are really helpful giving you a great diving experience

reviews.title: Wonderfull week of diving at Blue Paradise
reviews.text:
I went for a week to Hurghada and I couldn‚Äôt have chosen a better dive shop than Blue Paradise.
Their dive instructors are so skilled and super friendly and so is the owner! The boat they have is very comfortable, spacious and including a delicious lunch, with lovely staff. And they even pick you up every morning from your hotel and bring you back at the end of the day, by a very kind driver too.
So when I‚Äôm back in Hurghada for sure I will dive with Blue Paradise again!

reviews.title: 4 amazing diving day on Basyl
reviews.text:
Amazing instructors Mustafa and Joan are very professional and friendly. 
Courses are well explain.
We had an amazing 4 days with Blue Paradise.

reviews.title: Amazing!
reviews.text: Really enjoyed this company and their instructors. Family owned and a real chill vibe. Had a great time. And it was my first time! The instructor, Mo, made me feel safe. Thank you!

reviews.title: Super experience
reviews.text:
We did visit blue paradise and we can only have credit about the service.
Great host, great diving places but also a superb host!
Keep up the good work. Going back for sure to have another dive with my son!

reviews.title: Fantastic experience
reviews.text: Loved the whole trip. Everything is taken care of and you just have to go there and dive without worries. Friendly and skilled crew. Allready planning my next trip there.

reviews.title: A perfect first diving experience
reviews.text:
This agency is managed by european people. All the team on board is perfectly organized as well as very friendly. They speak dutch, french, english at least. Many returning customers. And i understand why. For my very first diving, all went smoothly thanks to the patient explanations and few exercices of practice. After jumping into the water, i was peacefully drived, enjoying the splendid scene. Basic gesture to deal with pressure and breathing well integrated made this first experience a pure delight.
If like me you are as much curious as stressed about all this diving stuff, these guys are exactly what i needed.

reviews.title: Superb dive center
reviews.text: Totally professional dive center. Have dived with them on numerous visits. Great dive masters. same crew year after year. Quality boat.  Home from home atmosphere. Bart the owner has got everything right. Can only recommend this dive center. You will not be disappointed.

reviews.title: A perfect day in Hurghada
reviews.text:
The perfect experience if you consider to get introduced to the beauty of the Red Sea!
A beautiful maintained boat, nice people and good food support a diving or snorkeling trip to worlds most beautiful world beneath the water.

reviews.title: Amaaazing!!!!
reviews.text: Amazing trip, very good staff. We had a birthday and they even gave us a cake!!!! We were 10 people and waiting already to come back!!!

reviews.title: Great instructors and well organized diving
reviews.text: A very good diving center. I sent a request via website and got a very quick response on WhatsApp. They were always in contact about pick-up from the hotel in advance and always checked in if everything is ok. Got my PADI AOW with Shazly, he‚Äôs an amazing instructor. I had to take 1 day private diving with him as a refresher because I haven‚Äôt dived in a very long time since my open water but it was worth it because he explained everything from the beginning very clearly. Also Youssef is awesome, he was my guide after my course and always made me feel happy and taken care of. Both Youssef and Shazly are very good at spotting interesting stuff underwater. I got to see a turtle, eagle ray, octopus but also lots of stonefish and lion fish that I wouldn‚Äôt spot myself. And nudibranchs! Everything was well organized. Highly recommend

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.text: Very professional instructor and friendly staff. I had an excellent experience. Communication before the diving was very smooth. Although I went alone, I didn‚Äôt feel lonely on the boat.

reviews.title: Helpful, friendly and organized
reviews.text: Very organized, helpful and friendly diving school. They are offering well-prized and qualitative courses and go diving to various beautiful dive sites on day trips every day. This year, we rented out a private boot to dive with them for a few days. It was a beautiful experience like the times before when I was diving with them in 2017 and 2021. Would come back to dive with them again :)

reviews.title: Wonderful experience
reviews.text:
All in all it was an amazing experience! The whole crew is extremely nice and courteous; they will help you with everything and take good care. You can get food on the boar, which is also very good and they will give you water. Not only Is everyone nice and welcoming, the diving experience was amazing as well and we even saw some dolphins, turtles and octopus! 
On the whole, the trip was amazing and we are happy to come back again!! :D

reviews.title: Fantastic diving day - what a team!
reviews.text:
We had an fantastic diving day for the end of our holidays! I got a very good and patient recap of the most important points, safety, and skills by Schazly, as my last dive has been several years ago. My girlfriend did a taster diving course and here Schazly did such a great job; very calm. We both enjoyed out dives so much. We went to awesome diving spots as well. Fathis hole team is so well organized, friendly, helpful, doing an excellent job - and they always have a smile. Thanks!
We're going with them again when coming to Hurghada again. Totally recommend!

reviews.title: Best team in Hurghada!!!
reviews.text:
Very pleasent team for diving. Try, learn, dive, enjoy time under water with them.
I was two times this year with them, and will come again!!

Great adventure!!!

reviews.title: Relexed training for PADI open water
reviews.text: It came to us spontaneously to do PADI open water.  Found this club with some google search.  In addition to a competitive price, we received a great deal of service.  The training and study was very relaxed but very serious.  Exercises that didn't go so well were repeated until they did.  We had 4 days but did it in 3 days and the fourth day was turned into a guided fun dive.  An absolute must for anyone who would like to dive in Hurgharda.

reviews.title: Nice friendly day.
reviews.text:
This was a really nice friendly day, I've found boat trips in the past to be a little too long, but this one could have continued for hours more. 

The crew took great care of the kids, ensuring they had life vests, a snorkel that fits and that that safety on board came first. 

Lunch was very nice, something for everybody.

Lots of room onboard, not crowded. 

Would definitely recommend. we'll be back.

reviews.title: Always A little vacation in one day.
reviews.text: Every year we are going with Maggy and Mo and each time it s like A little vacation in one day. Always seeing Dolphins, swimming with dolphins, the crew is awesome and the food is deliscious. I would highly recomment them.

reviews.title: Great day
reviews.text:
What a brilliant trip. Best we have ever had . Not to many people on board so freindly atmosphere, great food and a very proffesional service. Lots of germans but Mo speaks fluently English so there was no problem with communication everything was translated instantly. We swam 4 times with dolphins and had 2 great snorkeling times on the reef. You have a braekfast and lunch on board and also sweets and fruits and unlimited drinks. Mo explains everything what you need to know. People are very friendly and helpful and there is always a small boat with you in the water just in case. The divers swim with you to be sure you are ok. 
Really great time - my 5 years old loved it and we had so many photos swimming with he dolphins. 
I recommend it!!!!,!,
Worth the price and the prices are really very good for that kind of a service . Try you will not regret it. Thans Mo for a unforgettable experiance .

reviews.title: Great day
reviews.text: First off you should know this entire tour is in German. I had gathered that it was a German company but did not expect to have everything from instruction to the waiver all be in German. I had booked it based on the reviews. That being said, I talked to Mo that I did not speak German only english as well as members of the crew and there was no issues. Mo would explain everything to the whole boat which every single one of them was German, then would come to me to explain in English. The crew would also make sure they explained to me in English anything they were saying to the group. I am really happy with the day, we saw alot of dolphins and when the dolphins swam away with us after a couple tries of swimming with them we did not stress them out further and watched from the boat. I would highly recommend this tour for anyone looking to swim with some dolphins and experience some amazing snorkeling as well.

reviews.title: Recommended
reviews.text: Just got home from a very nice dolphin tour with Mo. Everything was very nice, we saw (and swam with) 40-50 dolphins over 4-5 dives + we dived at 2 nice coral reefs. Crew was very professional and funny, good dive masters. They didn't go to dolphin house like every one else, they respected if dolphins "didn't want to play". Got CD with video of underwater footage of all the dives at the end. Food was great for ship cooked meal standard. All in all a very nice experience and very recommended over all.

reviews.title: Mo's personal touch!  Great trip!
reviews.text:
We had a beautiful trip with Mo and his crew, late March 2017.  A very relaxed atmosphere and very well organized boattrip. Mo takes you out on a real individual tour, away from the rest. The early rise is really worthwhile. Also plenty of food and drinks on board. Good equipment without extra fee (flippers, masks etc.)
We spotted delphins almost continouisly.
Forget the salespersons from your touroperator. Just book Mo directly...
You won't regret it!

reviews.title: Unique experience and a must if you love dolphins
reviews.text:
Delfinausflug mit MO.
This team is professional and well organized.
You have breakfast and lunch on the boat.
Everything is taking care off when you step on the boat.
They have espect for nature and wildlife.
The swimming with dolphins is an unique experience.
You go places where other boats do not go.
On the way back you can get the professional photos and video on DVD if you want.
Very special. All the best to Maggie, Mo and the rest of the team.

reviews.title: Traumhafter Ausflug
reviews.text:
Moin,

unser Delfinausflug mit Mo war schon letztes Jahr im Oktober. Mir kamen grade wieder die Unterlagen und Werbeflyer von M in die Hand und da musste ich an dies einmalige Erlebnis mit viel Freude zur√ºckdenken.
Wir wurde auf dem Boot traumhaft von Achmed, Achmed und Achmed betreut. Essen war super. Die Schnorchelstops einfach gut ausgew√§hlt.
Leider konnten wir nicht mit den Delfinen Schnorcheln, habe Sie aber gesehen, ebenso haben wir einen Walhai gesehen, beeindruckendes Lebewesen.
Mein gro√ües Lob an die Mannschaft, die nicht wie die Ausflugsboote in der N√§he den Delfinen mit Tr√∂ten und Hupen hinterhergerast sind. Die Achmeds habe sich nicht an dieser "Jagd" beteiligt, im Gegenteil, sie haben gro√üen Abstand zu diesen Spinnern gesucht.
Ein unglaublich toller Tag. Auch nach 6 Monaten einen ganz lieben Dank.

Ralf und Tina

reviews.title: Eine perfekt abgestimmte professionelle Crew
reviews.text:
Wir sind schon oft mit Mo und seiner Crew auf See gegangen.
Wir wurden so herzlich empfangen.
Vom abholen Hotel bis zur R√ºckkehr l√§uft alles perfekt.
Man muss seine W√ºnsche oder Bedenken nur √§u√üern und es wird alles m√∂glich gemacht, wirklich alles.
Es wird auf Naturschutz geachtet. Man wird belehrt.
Selbst wenn man nicht schwimmen kann wird daf√ºr gesorgt das man viel zu sehen bekommt.
Sicherheit geht immer vor.
Wir haben uns immer sehr wohl gef√ºhlt und w√ºrden nat√ºrlich immer wieder mit ihnen reisen.

reviews.title: Magische Momente mit den Delfinen
reviews.text:
Schon zum zweiten Mal haben wir den Delfinausflug mit Mo gebucht. Diesmal waren unsere Freunde mit an Bord. Und was soll ich sagen: Es war ein fantastischer Tag!
Es war alles bestens organisiert. Wir wurden p√ºnktlich abgeholt und zum Boot gebracht. Das Team an Bord ist super nett, extrem hilfsbereich und sehr geduldig. Es gab super leckeres Essen ‚Äì vom Fr√ºhst√ºck √ºber das Mittagessen und zwischendurch noch Snacks und Obst ‚Äì alles war lecker!
Endlich durften wir auch M√§ggy mal pers√∂nlich kennen. Eine tolle Frau!
Dann kam der Moment, um ins Wasser zu gehen und mit den Delfinen zu schwimmen. Es war atemberaubend und absolut magisch! Das werden wir nie vergessen!
Unterwegs gab es auch zwei Stopps, um an einem Riff zu Schnorcheln. Acuh das ist sehr lohnenswert.

Wir k√∂nnen diesen Ausflug nur jedem empfehlen, der in und um Hurghada Urlaub macht! Ein absolutes Muss!

reviews.title: LUXOR PRIVAT
reviews.text: Great experience with this company.  We booked the "LUXOR PRIVATE' trip and we are will not regret it. Great communication before and after the day of the trip and a perfect trip itself.  Safe and friendly driver and a great tour ( thanks Ahned). We highly recommend thus company.

reviews.title: Mini Egypt and Hurghada
reviews.text: Thank you Memnon Reisen for a nice and informative day about Egypt and Hurghada! Absolute recommendation!

reviews.title: What a pleasure
reviews.text: We booked three private tours with Memnon: Luxor, Cairo and Hurghada. These trips were one of the best we have ever booked! The tour guides Ali (Cairo), Nasch (Luxor) and Gamal (Hurghada) brought us into some real egypt experience. Due to the big knowledge of our guides we really learned a lot about the life and culture in egypt. We are so thankful, because all drivers and guides were so friendly and polite. Thanks for your open arms and the way how you teached us your history and culture. We would always prefer Memnon tours.

reviews.title: Family tour through Cairo and Luxor
reviews.text: We booked a personalized trip through Memnon Reisen from Hurghada to Cairo to Luxor and back to Hurghada including a hot air balloon trip. It was well-organized and the guides were both incredibly knowledgeable and friendly! the transportation was clean and comfortable. I can highly recommend them for any and all of your tour needs. Thank you so much for a wonderful and memorable tour!

reviews.title: Nice dolphin trip at Hurghada
reviews.text: We did a dolphin trip with Memnon Reisen from Hurghada and we had a really great day. The team on the boat was nice and competent. Thank you for this great experience.

reviews.title: Great tour !
reviews.text: The tour was great and we saw many dolphins. The crew was very kind and the food was good. We would definitely come again.

reviews.title: Perfect Private Transfer
reviews.text: Everything was perfect. Driver was on time and we had a pleasant ride to our hotel. Communication was really good, we get an answer on every question immediately.

reviews.title: Egypcional!! 5‚≠ê
reviews.text:
We've done 2 trips, Luxor from Hurghada with the hot hair balloon and then we did the Paradise Island trip, it was incredible.

They were 24 hour responsive, they provide information about everything, were always 100% punctual! The transfers were amazing and the drivers were so nice.

Our experience in Luxor was absolutely perfect! The hot air balloon ride was a one in a life time experience: watching the sunrise over the Valley of the Kings and the Nile, breath taking. Our guide (Atif) explained EVERYTHING in detail and answered every question, he was just the best. And we got to enjoy 1 hour in the Nile boat all by ourselves! It was so relaxing. Our driver (Michael) was always asking if we needed cool water and snacks (that were available throughout the whole tour).

If you visit Egypt you can trust Memnon Raisen for great experiences and great services!

reviews.title: Highly recommend
reviews.text: I book orange üçä bay snorkeling trip with Memnon Reisend, and it was my the best experience!! Highly recommend to everyone

reviews.title: Super Wow
reviews.text: I had a amazing trip to Mahmya island with Memnon Reisen! It was amazing service from team and great prices üòä I highly recommend üëç

reviews.title: Amazing Wild Dolphin Swim
reviews.text: I had a dolphin tour on 1/13/23. This is one of the best dedicated dolphin swim operator (crew and back office team) there is in Hurghada!  I have joined other boats and Liveaboard scuba diving many places around the world, always wanted to stay with dolphins longer than few minutes. They are the only team who fulfilled my expectations. They were confident and knowledgeable in their search, once found took greatest care guiding and protecting the swimmers. We were close arm‚Äôs length to the dolphins yet they stayed with us. Sharif was a great free diver and lots of close up video of the dolphins so we can keep for precious memories of being with such amazing ocean mammals. I would definitely join them again when returning to Hurghada and highly recommend them to anyone.

reviews.title: Amazing day swimming with wild dolphins in the red sea
reviews.text: Had an amazing day with Sherife and his team swimming with so many wild dolphins! These guys are dedicated to the cause and I mean dedicated - binoculars out, running round the boat, walkie talkies out, multiple tries at getting you in the water. We thought about cheaping out and doing one of the ‚Ç¨35 tours, but I'm so glad we didn't. This one was steeper ‚Ç¨75 but we swam with dolphins 3 times and swam in coral reefs twice, plus saw a huge whale shark which was phenomenal!! The first time was only 2 and we only caught a glimpse, second time was a pod of 8 including a baby and it was magical - we swam with them for a few minutes and they were curious about us, final time was 2 and they were curious about us too! Core memories made. The food was great, staff were so attentive. One family had 2 kids and the staff were great with them in the water. They record your entire experience on a gopro. We only speak English and it was not a problem at all, everything was spoken in German and English, booked via WhatsApp. Honestly amazing day, pay the extra. In comparison, the other ships dunk you in, you catch a glimpse and that's you done with about 100 other people.

reviews.title: Best crew in Egypt
reviews.text: I can highly recommend SimSim. Samir and his crew are amazing. It's an early start but well worth it, because you are out on the Red Sea before all of the other tourists and they make sure that everyone is safe when out snorkelling- always with a guide and small boat. The service on board, breakfast and lunch is perfect. Got to see so many dolphins and was lucky to see them swim right underneath me. Big thumbs up from me.  Thank you from Sharon & Daniel

reviews.title: The best day of my life!
reviews.text: I have always dreamed of swimming with dolphins but I do not support any animals being kept in captivity. When I found out about SimSim I was surprised they do the dolphin tours in the Red Sea and I booked straight away. It did worth every penny! It was the most amazing experience I could ever ask for. We were picked up by a very friendly gentleman and the guys on the boat was very friendly ensuring everybody is having a great time. We found two groups of dolphins - first one which was not very playful and the second one that was very playful and stayed with us for a little bit. It was absolutely brilliant to be near these beautiful creatures. The snorchling at the coral reefs was great as well,just beautiful. The food on the boat was great as well with the afternoon snacks like watermelon and donuts. I can‚Äôt remember the names of the guys on the boat but they were just all great. I cannot recommend this enough. We will definitely be doing this again in the future but will need to practice the swimming so I can keep up with the dolphins :)

reviews.title: Brilliant Trip - Choose Simsim (English family)
reviews.text:
We are an English family with 9 & 10 Yr old girls who chose simsim following recommendations on Facebook. Not the cheapest operator but you definitely get what you pay for and would strongly recommend using this company. We chatted with others at the hotel after and their trips with others were crowded, rushed and not anywhere near as good. 
Boat is very comfortable and so much space (small group size). Nice food and drinks for whole trip (sea sickness allowing). Staff very welcoming to non-German speakers and made such an effort to look after our children's safety. Good equipment (short wetsuits worth paying 5 euro for) and an inflatable speedboat towed out to drop snorkellers off near the reef to save swimming long distances against currents. Knowledgeable team really cared for the dolphins and environment and put a big effort in to find them for us. No one was rushed until everyone was happy (some people got back in for 2-3 swims with dolphins). Snorkelling the coral reef was fantastic too.
Early start is well worth it to be the only boat with the dolphins.
FANTASTIC

reviews.title: Nice day trip to see dolphins
reviews.text:
Nice day trip to see dolphins in the red sea.

Pick up from hotel on time - good

Nice boat

Good staff

Nice food, but it would be nice with more of healthy  snacks like fruits.

We saw a lot of dolphins and where very close to them - a really good experience 

DOWNSIDE: People are allowed to SMOKE on board !!! It's really nasty to sit and have a cigarette as a non smoker. I don't wanna have lung cancer...

reviews.title: Amazing dolphin trip
reviews.text: We had heard so much about SimSim from a friend that my son & I decided to take a trip with them rather than go through the hotel & travel agent recommendation. We were not disappointed! We were looked after so well, on the day we chose for the trip the rest of the guests were German but that did not matter. Everything was explained to us in English & if anything I felt like I got special treatment! Every time there was a dolphin sighting the team made sure I was one of the first in the water with them & I had my own guide Kareem for snorkelling in the afternoon who took me to all the best areas. The day was fantastic, to be surrounded by dolphins in an open sea is the best feeling in the world. The food & drink facilities were good & the fact that Samir went the extra mile to find dolphins away from other boats made our experience even more special. My son enjoyed the day as much as me & I would highly recommend this trip to anyone. I will certainly be doing it again. It was simply one of the best days of my life - thank you!

reviews.title: Expected good but got excellent
reviews.text: Wow. What an awesome day. We got to play with the dolphins who were not in the least bit fazed by our presence. The operators are so courteous towards the dolphins. Sim Sim were fantastic and took care of every want. Plenty of food and drink available onboard. We were picked up from our hotel on time and everything was as we were advised. We went hoping for good but left having experienced an excellent day and with memories for life.

reviews.title: Amazing expoerince and excellent professional trip!
reviews.text: After doing a lot of research I do believe that SIm Sim are one of the best around. We went on a trip with SimSim on 26th December and it was fantastic and I would say good value for money too. We were blessed to have the opportunity to swim with wild dolphins in the beautiful Red Sea and also made some stops to do snorkelling. Samir and his amazing and highly professional team really took care of us and the rest of the group. We had a delicious spread of food for breakfast and lunch and snacks and drink throughout the day. The hospitality form Samir and his team was really lovely and you can see that they all love what they do and love the Dolphins. I would highly recommend SimSim if you are looking for a truly magical, professional and personal experience. Thank you so much for a wonderful time on your beautiful boat with delicious food and fantastic company! :-)

reviews.title: Swimming with wild dolphins!!
reviews.text:
We found out about SimSim from our hotels facebook page as many guests had used them before. 
They collected us from our hotel and we drove to Hurgharda marina to the boat where we were welcomed by the lovely Samir and crew. 
The boat is beautiful and we felt very safe. After setting sail, we were served with a delicious breakfast...loved the pancakes and Nutella! 
The guys were constantly on the look out for dolphins and seeing them for the first time is an experience we will never forget. 
We swam with them at several stop offs, it was awesome! 
Lunch was served and we had more opportunities to swim again. 
To top off the day, the dolphins gave us a great show by jumping and tail slapping, then they swam along the boat on our return to the marina. 
It was one if the best days of my life and we will have to do this again in the future.
Thanks to Samir and the crew....and your English was very good :)

reviews.title: Ein Tag in Kairo
reviews.text:
Wir wurden morgens √ºberp√ºnktlich im Hotel abgeholt und zum Flughafen gebracht. Im Auto erhielten wir die original Flugtickets.
In Kairo hat uns Jakob in Empfang genommen .
Er fuhr uns sicher durch Kairo und erkl√§rte uns vom Auto alles was auf dem Weg lag .
Als erstes fuhren wir zu den Pyramiden. Ein unbeschreiblich beeindruckendes Gef√ºhl vor der Cheops Pyramide zu stehen. 
Auch hat Jakob uns einen Kamelritt besorgt .
Nach den Pyramiden sind wir zur Sphinx,  Jakob konnte uns alle Fragen super erkl√§ren. Er spricht perfekt deutsch . 
Nach den Pyramiden und der Sphinx sind wir ins koptische Viertel und zur h√§ngenden Kirche. 
Mittagessen gabs in einem einheimischen Restaurant. 
Als wir uns gest√§rkt hatten ging es zu den Basaren .
Schmuckbasar , Gew√ºrzbasar , Kleiderbasar ein wahnsinnig tolles Erlebnis. 
Am Schluss sa√üen wir entspannt in einem Kaffehaus und haben die Eindr√ºcke von Kairo auf uns wirken lassen bevor Jakob uns zum Flughafen fuhr.

Ein wundervoller , beeindruckender Tag war zu Ende. 

Vielen Dank Jakob und Sun and Fun ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è

reviews.title: Luxor-Nilfahrt-Mittagessen-Tal der K√∂nige
reviews.text: Wir haben die Luxor-Tour gebucht. Einschlie√ülich Nilfahrt und Mittagessen. Es war eine spannende und informative Tour und die Mitarbeiter haben einen tollen Job gemacht. Unsere Erwartungen wurden √ºbertroffen. Es war wie eine Reise in einer Zeitkapsel. Wir sind durch viele Jahrhunderte gereist. Ich kann die Tour nur w√§rmstens empfehlen.

reviews.title: Privatausflug nach Ksiro
reviews.text:
Wir habeb einen Privatausflug mit Flugzeug von El Gouna nach Kairo gebucht .Alle Inklusivleistungen haben bestens geklappt..von der Abholung vom Hotel bis zum Return ins Hotel !! Unser Guide Jakob hat uns in Kairo vom Flughafen abgeholt und wir f√ºhlten uns in dieser gro√üen Stadt sofort gut augehoben !! Er f√ºhrte uns ins √Ñgyptische Museum...ohne Wartezeit...zu den Pyramiden, Sphinx...er kannte alle Schleichwege und vor allem  alle entscheidenden Leute am Eingang, in den Restaurants und an den Parkpl√§tzen .Somit lernten wir an einem Tag vie viel mehr kennen ,als es in einer Gruppe m√∂glich w√§re !!! Wir empfehlen diese Tour unbedingt weiter! Wir sind in El Gouna zur√ºck mit einer Menge von Eindr√ºcken, die uns so schnell nicht mehr loslassen werden ! Danke Jakob!!
Petra und Michael

reviews.title: Ob unsere Privattour nach Luxor, oder unsere private W√ºstentour kann ich jedem nur empfehlen.
reviews.text: Wir weilten im Dezember in Hurghada und buchten bei Sun und Fun eine Privattour nach Luxor. Es klappte alles bestens, wurden p√ºnktlich vom Hotel ab geholt und konnten unser Programm selbst zusammen stellen.Unser Fahrer Wagdi und unser Reiseleiter Hany waren einsame Spitze. Ich kann Sun und Fun jedem nur empfehlen, der etwas von √Ñgypten sehen will, vorallem auch abseits der Touristenpfade.

reviews.title: Ein fantastischer Tag in Kairo
reviews.text:
Ein fantastischer Tag in Kairo
Auch wir haben mit Sun&Fun Reisen einen gro√üartigen Tag in Kairo verbracht. Um 4 Uhr morgens wurden wir vom Hotel abgeholt und zum Flughafen Hurghada gebracht, wo gleich ein Foto von uns gemacht wurde. Den Reisepreis haben wir dem Fahrer in bar gezahlt. Dann ging‚Äôs los per Flugzeug eine knappe Stunde nach Kairo. Dort erwartete uns der Reiseleiter Atef mit dem Fahrer Ahmed. Wir fuhren mit dem Auto in die Altstadt, wo es  am fr√ºhen Morgen noch sehr ruhig war. In den Souks war alles noch geschlossen und verschlafen, es war interessant mal hinter die Kulissen zu schauen. In einem kleinen Caf√© haben wir dann gefr√ºhst√ºckt  Viele Einheimische gr√º√üten uns mit einem freundlichen L√§cheln. Es folgte eine Bootsfahrt auf dem Nil, aber es war sehr kalt und wir waren froh, dass die Fahrt nicht so lang war. Anschlie√üend konnten wir im √Ñgyptischen Museum die ber√ºhmten Sch√§tze der Pharaonenzeit bewundern. Das war einfach gro√üartig und man h√§tte noch viel mehr Zeit dort verbringen k√∂nnen. Atef zeigte uns dann im Koptischen  Viertel einige Kirchen, das war sehr interessant. Er hat uns viel √ºber das Leben der √Ñgypter in den verschiedenen geschichtlichen Epochen erz√§hlt. Wir fuhren dann zu den ber√ºhmten Pyramiden und sahen auch den Sphinx. Hier gab es jede Menge Fotomotive. Es war ein wunderbares Erlebnis, diese Weltwunder der Antike einmal zu sehen. Wir konnten dann noch eine Papyrusfabrik besichtigen und ein paar Souvenirs kaufen, bevor wir in einem guten Restaurant ein sp√§tes Mittagessen einnahmen. Das Essen war frisch zubereitet und schmeckte sehr gut. Auf der Fahrt zum Flughafen konnten wir noch einmal viel von Kairo sehen und Atef beantwortete gern unsere Fragen. Der Tag verging so schnell und schon mussten wir wieder mit dem Flugzeug zur√ºck nach Hurghada. Es war ein super sch√∂ner Ausflug! Wir m√∂chten uns bei Atef und Ahmed und dem Team von Sun& Fun ganz herzlich bedanken.
Karin und Gerd

reviews.title: Luxor Privat Tour
reviews.text: Buchten die Tour schon von deutschland aus online  f√ºr 2 personen. Sind p√ºnktlichst im Resort abgeholt worden.  Danach ging es entspannt im gepflegten Suv Richtung Luxor.  Unser Fahrer absolut Top und hat Spa√ü gemacht zuzusehen mit welcher Leichtigkeit er durch den Verkehr navigierte. Haben Dann spontan entschlossen uns den Tempel von Dendera anzusehen was wirklich eine der besten Ideen war. Danach ging es ins Tal der K√∂nige.  Entspannt mit dem Transfer zu den Gr√§bern wo wir alle Zeit hatten uns umzusehen.  Von dort zum Totentempel der Hatshepsut. Hier wieder jegliche Zeit uns auch selbst die Sachen genauer anzusehen die wir m√∂chten.  Haben dann den Tag bei einem tollen √§gyptischen Mittagessen und einer nilfahrt ausklingen lassen. Am Heimweg noch an den Memnon Kolossen vorbei geht ein wahnsinnig sch√∂ner und kulturreicher Tag zuende. Wir k√∂nnen es nur empfehlen.  Alles Fragen wurden beantwortet uns f√ºhlten uns rundum bestens Betreut. Vom Guide sowie auch vom Fahrer der stehts zuvorkommend war und auch auf unseren wasserhaushalt achtete :)   unser n√§chster Ausflug ist jedenfalls schon gebucht  !  LG Christian und Kyreen

reviews.title: boat trip to gifton island -Nabq tours
reviews.text:
From the 1st minute to the last , this boat trip was breathtaking . It was the highlight of our holiday in Hurgarda. 
The boat was large enough , clean , with a lovely upper deck . The crew were warm, friendly , professional , knowledgeable and Fun . They had all the snookling equipment needed to enjoy the coral reefs . Dropped anchor off gifton island for a few hours at orange bay . The beech and turquoise shallow sea are heavenly . 
Back to the boat , and the crew served up a wonderful hot buffet style lunch which went down a treat .
Onboard is a photographer who is taking pictures throughout the day above and below the water . Well worth the money !
The entire day was full of fun that won't be forgotten . 
Can't recommend highly enough !  It's a must !

reviews.title: Always ready to provide the fun!!
reviews.text: I have used Nabq Tours for 12 years on numerous trips to Egypt. I will only ever use them. They never let me down and always provide the best prices. The team are professional and efficient as well as friendly and welcoming. They are always at hand to answer any questions and they always deliver as promised. I have done quad biking, trips to Cairo and camel riding to top it off!!. The private trip to Cairo with your own tour guide is a lovely touch to personalise your day, I highly recommend that!!. Nabq Tours have something for the whole family to enjoy and you can trust that they will keep you safe along the way. You can plan all of your excursions prior to your arrival if you like to have things in place in advance, that is usually what I do but it isn't mandatory. I recommend them to anyone I know that is visiting because they are reliable and always able to cater to my needs.
