description:
Embark on a once-in-a-lifetime adventure with Sindbad Submarines, the only real submarines in Africa. Out of only 14 recreational submarines worldwide, two are here in Hurghada, Egypt, ready to take you on an unforgettable journey 25 meters below the sea. Explore 500 meters of stunning coral reef and meet the fascinating marine inhabitants of the Red Sea.

Relax in the air-conditioned comfort and safety of our submarine, equipped with 44 passenger seats, two pilots' seats, and spacious round viewing windows for passengers to admire the breathtaking views. Discover the beauty of the underwater world without getting wet and create memories that will last a lifetime.

We make your experience effortless, with point-to-point transfer from your hotel to our terminal, including land-sea transportation, all while providing an exceptional level of service. Book now and experience a truly unique adventure in the Red Sea with Sindbad Submarines.

reviews.title: Fantastic company, great service
reviews.text: Spent ten days travelling Egypt solo. Involved 6 transfers to and from airports and a 4 hour drive from Luxor to Hurghada. I took a chance following the reviews I read about Hurghada and Luxor transfers and booked everything with them. And I‚Äôm so pleased I did, the service I received was impeccable Mohamed was great, responding quickly to messages and providing reassurance. His drivers were always there on time. They were polite, respectful and helpful. If you are travelling to Egypt contact Mohamed for all your needs, he is reliable, offers competitive prices and won‚Äôt let you down.

reviews.title: Excellent company, wouldn't use any other for transfers tours or trips in Egypt.
reviews.text:
Have used this company and Moh for all our trips and transfers over the last four years, 
Nothing is too much trouble for Moh and his team of guides and drivers.

Top class immaculate vehicles,  excellent drivers,

This trip an overnight one from Hurghada to Luxor was as amazing as our previous trips organised by Moh, my husband and I have been to Luxor a couple of times but for our sons it was their first trip to Luxor.

Our guide in Luxor Rady was brilliant,  he is so knowledgeable and is excellent at explaining ancient Egyptian history to kids in an informative and engaging way. 

Luxor is so amazing , there is so much to see, so much history, if you get the chance go, and definitely do an overnight trip , there are not alot of places to experience a sunset as amazing and beautiful than on the Nile River in Luxor.

We also did a private glass bottomed boat trip when we were back in Hurghada,  we have done this trip before and the kids really wanted to do it again especially as my older daughter had also joined us in Hurghada for a few days after we got back from Luxor. 

You will not be disappointed with the service you get from this company,  Moh and his team go above and beyond to ensure you and your family have the best holiday.

Thanks to Moh, our drivers and our guide in Luxor Rady.

See you all on our next visit

reviews.title: Excellent company
reviews.text: Absolutely fantastic company to use. Moh makes every customer feel special, no what service he is providing for you. I can highly recommend his taxi transfer service to and from Hurghada airport. You not only get an excellent driver, you also get a wealth of information from him during your transfer. Once you have contacted Moh for any of his services, he will make you feel special.

reviews.title: Totally fab
reviews.text: Once again the service we received  was outstanding .. Moh snd his team do out of their way to look after you, from hotel transfers to private trips ,, outstanding service

reviews.text: Clean new car. Driver was very helpful and we made a few stops for food which he purchased for us at local markets. Very easy, every smooth no hassle.

reviews.title: Fantastic experience all round, brilliant organisation too!
reviews.text:
We had a brilliant experience with Hurghada and Luxor transfers.
We started with a long transfer from Hurghada to Luxor which meant we could save a lot of money on the flight and fly into Hurghada from the UK. The transfer was brilliant and the driver even stopped and bought us some food and drink which was incredibly generous.

Next we had a quad bike which was absolutely spectacular and very reasonably priced compared to competitors. It was one of our highlights. 

However the biggest highlight which I urge anyone to do is the balloon flight over Luxor. You will not regret it. It was breathtaking and again one of the best prices we found. 

I should add that the owner of the agency Moh was very patient in going through lots of details and options with me, and checked in regularly to check that everything was OK. I can be a very detailed overwhelming customer and he dealt with it with a lot of patience and time!

Strongly recommend to anyone :).

reviews.title: Amazing experience
reviews.text:
I was part of a couple who did a 2 day tour, with overnight stay in Luxor. The tour was jam packed with incredible sights, but never felt rushed. Highlight for me was visiting Hatshepsut Temple, absolutely phenomenal views in the middle of the valley and the history to see play out on the walls was amazing! - Rady our tour guide was so knowledgeable and answered all the daft questions I had, It was such an honour to have him as a teacher, thank you so much. Salah our driver was like a magician, he was everywhere we needed him to be, perfectly on time. Stopped for breaks when we needed and bought refreshments for the journey. 
Massive thank you Moh for arranging this once in a lifetime tour, thank you Salah for keeping us safe and getting us to and around Luxor and thank you Rady for sharing your knowledge and enthusiasm, you made the trip amazing for us! Thank you!!

reviews.title: Very genuine people
reviews.text: Amazing experience highly recommended to anyone visiting Hurghada or Luxor, very honest people go above and beyond for your Egyptian experience

reviews.title: Valley of Kings, Hatshepsut, Karnak and Luxor Temples, Luxor Museum
reviews.text: If you are looking to take in Luxor in two days with young children and learn more about Egypt than just what you see then make sure that you get in touch with Moh and request that  Ahmed Mustafa is your guide. Mustafa‚Äôs pedagogical training and excellent English helped to bring Luxor alive for our 7 year old. He is adept at drawing on his deep historical knowledge to explain the spirituality and traditions of the pharaohs, Egyptian religion, and other aspects of ancient Egypt. His guiding inspired even greater interest in the region and got us thinking that we are in need of a second visit to explore Egypt further. He and Moh‚Äôs team are well prepared, getting us about quickly and took us to each of the sites at what seemed to be the quietest (least busy) moments. Highly recommended.

reviews.title: No Worries !
reviews.text:
You want professional but relaxed diving ? - look no further‚Ä¶
This was my first experience diving in Hurghada, and in fact my first diving anywhere since before Covid. As you would expect, Steve wanted a quick look at my basic skills before committing to open water, but he went out of his way to ensure I wasn‚Äôt going to feel worried or intimidated by the prospect. A close-in shore dive was prescribed - just me and him - super chilled-out from the very beginning, right to the end.
Box ticked, the next day I enjoyed three excellent boat dives, while Emma encouraged my sea-shy partner to try some snorkelling - even offering use of her personal wetsuit for the occasion. That in itself is testimony to the prevailing calm and relaxed ‚Äúvibe‚Äù of the Dive UK Hurghada team, and the small, personalised service they are aiming at.
I‚Äôve actually been diving for decades - Australia, Mauritius, Cuba, New Guinea, Thailand, Cyprus, The Maldives, Fiji, Mexico, Greece, blah blah blah‚Ä¶ Trust me - Steve and his team are up there with the best.

reviews.title: Brilliant time diving
reviews.text:
I don‚Äôt normally write many reviews - but I feel compelled to write this one.  I have just enjoyed a fantastic 3 days diving with the Dive UK crew in Hurghada.  I have been fortunate enough to dive with many people around the world and these guys are right up there with the best.  Not only was the diving safely and knowledgeably lead (I saw some beautiful species of fish that I would have normally swum right past such as a Red Sea Walkman and a Devil Scorpion Fish) but the onshore / on boat experience was fun and relaxed with no egos and a lot of laughs. The team have this great ability to slow everything down and still be on time for everything. Their passion for what they do  - sharing the Red Sea experience with others is infectious.  

I had not dived for a few years because of Covid and Emma went through a refresher with me that was thorough and great fun  with a couple of scenic dives from the shore in relatively shallow water with loads to see - this gave me so much confidence to get on the boat I then finally (after nearly 70 dives) did my Advanced Open Water - (I had always avoided it cos I just wanted to dive not study on holiday) but Steve and Wasam made it so easy because of their great instruction.  

I also watched them take some guys completely new to diving and introduce them to the wonders of life beneath the waves - they went off the boat for the first time like they had been diving for years!  - it was lovely to hear their observations after their adventures - congrats to Daniele and Bradley on your Open Water certification - I hope that this is the start of a beautiful journey for you.  

In short  - whether you are new to diving or highly experienced I would highly recommend the team at Dive UK if you want a great (and safe) diving experience in Hurghada.  

Catch you again soon guys.

reviews.title: An unbelievable experience.
reviews.text:
After going in to scuba diving with a feeling of trepidation, I was soon put at ease. 
Both Steve and Maged made the complex process of scuba diving easy to understand and had a calming presence. 

I passed my Open Water, Advanced Open Water and Rescue Diver course over our two week stay in Hurghada and in the process I witnessed the most mind blowing scenes. Colours that you wouldn‚Äôt believe could exist in nature and coral fans the size of pickup trucks. The coral reefs were indescribably epic. 

I couldn‚Äôt recommend Steve and his team enough. 10/10.

reviews.title: Amazing diving experience!
reviews.text: I booked three days of diving during my holiday on Hurghada and Dive UK Hurghada was amazing! Steve organised everything, included transfers from my hotel to the dive centre and checked in after dives despite being out of town. Diving with Maged was fantastic. He is a very skilled and knowledgeable diver. The dive sites chosen were beautiful. The boat and boat staff were lovely. I can't wait to dive with Dive UK Hurghada again!

reviews.title: Steak bake in mind
reviews.text: We had a great time diving with Dive Uk,pick-up was very punctual,and not too early! Dive guides and instructors were very good,on our dives we had three lovely ladies, Emma,Mel and Erin who looked after us when we were diving. It‚Äôs not too often in my experience of diving in Egypt,that you meet many if any British divers,so to find this company was a god send! We will be back in May 23,I would thoroughly recommend Dive Uk to anyone,especially Brits,so if you are heading to Hurghada to dive,look up Steve and his team

reviews.title: Great time training & diving in Hurghada ü§ø‚òÄÔ∏èüê†
reviews.text: Spent a really enjoyable week in Hurghada with Dive UK Hurghada doing PADI Wreck & Peak Performance Buoyancy specialities as well as EFR and Rescue course. Steve is a great instructor - very clear, consise and knowledgeable as well as very organised, passionate and professional - he arranged the entire week impeccably. The kit I rented was good quality and very well maintained in case you need to hire. It was pretty full on with plenty of learning but managed to have lots of fun too exploring Seagull Marina (Wreck Susana) and some local dive sites by boat. Steve arranged my EFR and Rescue course with Maged, who was also a brilliant instructor and communicator. Highly recommend Dive UK Hurghada to anyone who wants a great diving experience in the Red Sea.

Whilst being here he has  taught and helped us qualify in our padi open water and open water advance! Can't  recommend him enough! The whole time we were having fun and the week has flown by! Steve looks after you from start to finish, meeting every need!

reviews.title: Unforgettable liveaboard week & cairo trip!

reviews.title: Reactivate dive and fun dives!
reviews.text:
After 5 years out from passing my open water I was slightly nervous, so I booked a reactivate course with Steve and team. Steve was really reassuring, calm and helpful and I got my confidence back straight away! The refresher proved invaluable as I was able to sort my buoyancy and weight needed for the salty Red Sea - ready for the dives the following two days! 

Emma and crew were so welcoming and helpful on the boat, they really made the two days of diving super fun! 

The team were really knowledgeable about the sites and what we would see! The sites were completely stunning - full of life and healthy coral, everything is dreamed about the Red Sea. A dive highlight was spotting an eagle Ray flying by!

The whole experience ran super smoothly and we‚Äôll have the memories and photos forever! We‚Äôll definitely be back!!

reviews.title: Fantastic experience. Fell in love with the Red Sea
reviews.text:
I was in Hurghada and wanted to do some diving, I am an ex Padi DM and my partner is an OW diver and we haven‚Äôt dived since a couple of years before covid.  I found Steve and Dive UK Hurghada and I can say it was an absolute Joy. They really are trying to bring British standards to the red sea. The standards were very high, the equipment was very new and highly maintained/looked after. 
We booked a reactive course for my partner and a couple of dives for me to refresh my skills and the confidence to enjoy diving again. Steve was fantastic with my partner who had become nervous about diving again. We then spend 2 days on the dive boat diving some lovely sites with a great Egyptian instructor and British DM who were lots of fun and very professional. 
We had the pleasure of diving with one student who had just taken her open water and advanced with Steve who had told us she was very nervous when she started, 7 days earlier. She was so confident and happy in the water and a joy to dive with. A testament to the courses.
Thanks again Steve and the team we will be back!

reviews.title: 5 Days in Kairo and Alexandria
reviews.text: We really enjoyed our short visit in Cairo, the whole trip was perfectly organized by Mr.Saladien. The guide and driver were very friendly and helpful. Our hotel was amazing (Steigenberger) and like an oasis of peace in the vibrant city.

reviews.title: Amazing Egypt Trip
reviews.text:
I reseached for Egypt trips to fit the autumn holidays of my teen child and no trip seemed to fit. Mr Saladien taylored the trip for us, so that we can see Cairo, make a trip on the Nile and go to the Red Sea in 13 days. 
For an European used to get reservations, bills, etc. the process might be a bit unusual, but rest assured- everything is organised perfectly, all guides, drivers are on time and helpful, all is arranged and taken care of. One of my first holidays where I did not have to arrange a single thing. Egyptian people are very hospitable and have long traditios in welcoming tourists. 
Wollte mich f√ºr die wundervolle Reise bedanken, wir haben uns immer sehr gut aufgehoben gef√ºhlt, alles war super organisiert, alle Leute immer sehr korrekt und p√ºnktlich! Wir haben die Sch√∂nheit und Gastfreundschaft in √Ñgypten als einzigartig erlebt. Vielen Dank auch am Achmed f√ºr seine M√ºhe, Kompetenz und Hilfe!

Ich habe Sie schon als Reiseveranstalter an Bekannten empfohlen!

Nochmals Danke und alles alles Gute aus Wien!

reviews.title: second time wonderful trip to Assuan by car and train
reviews.text: already experienced once the year before we booked a trip to Assuan from Hurghada. Everything was perfectly organized. Next year we will surely do it again. The Tolip Hotel is excellent.

reviews.title: Amazing experience! (We're already considering a second trip :D)
reviews.text:
I discovered the travel agency "Reisen in √Ñgypten" by chance online, and I was very positively impressed since the early planning stages: immediate responses to any enquiries, flexibility, helpfullness and reliability, which were confirmed throughout the trip.

It was the first time for me in Egypt, and, being really passionate about the ancient Egyptian civilization, culture and history, I had wanted to visit this country for a long time, so, when I finally planned to go with a friend this November, we looked for a trip that allowed us to see all of the main highlights, without having to think of any organizational or logistical aspects, and Reisen in √Ñgypten completely met our expectations. 

We chose an 11-day trip, with the first three nights in Cairo (staying at the beautiful Sofitel on the island El Gezirah - the breakfast buffet is incredible, the spa and pool with Nile view totally worth a visit and the signature perfume in the lobby is addictive :)), visiting the archeological sites of Saqqara, Gizah and Memphis, the Egyptian Museum and the old Citadel, and taking a 1-day trip to Alexandria. 

We then flew to Luxor and boarded the Nile Cruise Ship "Blue Shadow" (very clean rooms, friendly staff, good food - especially the oriental dinners!), where we stayed for the rest of our trip. We first visited the Valley of the Kings near Luxor, including the astounding Temple of Hatshepsut, and the Memnon Colossi, and then travelled south and stopped at the temples of Efdu and Kom Ombo, before arriving in Aswan. Here we took two facultative excursions (both highly recommended): one to the temples of Abu Simbel (including an exciting ride through the desert) and a boat trip thorough the amazing natural landscape of the Nile river to a Nubian village (swim in the Nile included :)). In Aswan, we visited Philae Temple, the High Dam and the local spices market. Now and then we also had time to relax on the sun deck of the ship (with pool ;)) and take in the breathtaking Nile views.

All our visits were conceived as private tours (with private cars and drivers - big shoutout to our amazing driver in Cairo and Alexadria, Abdallah :D), and we were either only the two of us or at most six people at a time. 

And, most importantly, we were always accompanied by our great tour guides (Abdallah in Cairo and Alexandria, and Ahmed during the whole Nile Cruise), both Egyptologists who could speak perfect German, answered all of our (many! :D) questions, were patient and helpful with our requests, and always friendly and funny. Same goes for Mr. Saladien, director of the agency, who took time to show us around in Hurghada himself, so that also our last day was not "wasted" only travelling.

Last but not least: as women travelling alone, we did not have any unpleasant experiences, quite on the contrary, we were always treated with utmost respect, courtesy and friendliness. Neither did we have any problems with the food, but as a precaution we avoided eating unpeeled raw fruits and vegetables and we used bottled water also when brushing our teeth.

If we can give a suggestion for the future: some of the visits (for example the temple of Ramses III in Thebes West - Medinet Habu) were only available against payment of a non-insignificant extra-amount. Perhaps they could already be included in the program ;)

reviews.title: Great experince with wonderful organized tour
reviews.text: Everything was perfectly organized and we had wonderful hotels and nil cruise. We had 10 days tour and the whole team was fantastic. Guides can speak German and are great. we can highly recommend.

reviews.title: Perfect organization, but Egypt it self: NEVER AGAIN
reviews.text: The organisation was REALLY NICE, the tour guides Ashraf and Achmed were just perfect and Mr. Saladien from the organisation too - thanks for the great service! Unfortunately it was a horrible trip nevertheless and i am sorry to write this, but I have to warn others... our trip was horrible, due to really bad quality of the food, missing cleanliness and generell pollution of the country. The outcome was, that we were totally sick. If you have to vomit the half of your trip (on a nilecruise) and if you have 7 days diarrhea, you cant enjoy this trip. So my recommendation for all visitors, would be that you eat only in European organized hotels / restaurants, because the risk everywhere else is just too high. Of course do not drink tabwater - but i think this should be anyway clear. But also be carefully with fruits and salats - they wash it with water from the Nile. So many passengers on our trip had to vomit or had diarrhea, so this HAS TO BE due to missing cleanness or quality of the food  / water. The doctor who treat us, called the whole sickness "traveler diarrhea" and told us this comes from climate change, not from pollution or food - come on, we are travelling through the whole world and had often to deal with MANY climate changes - NO WHERE we had to deal with such results. And our first hotel in Cairo (SOFITEL) was just nice, we had no sickness and no problems - because it was an European hotel with good food quality. It is also a clear sign than so many people are talking about such experiences just from Egypt - from nowhere else i heard such storys. If you ask travellers from Egypt, nearly everybody will tell you about diarrhea. So this CANT be about travelling and climate change. it is really sad, because the country with all his cultural treasures is great and the organization from "REISEN IN √ÑGYPTEN" was really really GOOD! But for us, it has the consequence that we wont visit this country again.

reviews.title: Wonderful holiday
reviews.text:
For me was it a very nice cultural trip in Egypt. I was the first time in Egypt. The organisation was best and the tour guides had a very good education as Egyptologist. 
It was very good that we were a small group of tourists. So we could better understand all and got a lot of additional information. I am very interest of the Pharaonen time and I read a lot of books and saw in TV description of Arch√§ologists.
All booked hotels were good selected and the service was best. 
The Egypt people are very pleasant and the Egypt county is wonderful.
Many thanks Mister Saladien for all.

reviews.title: 8 Day Cultural Trip from Cairo to Luxor
reviews.text: My family and I booked an 8-day trip with Reisen in √Ñgypten and had the greatest time! Mr. Saladien and his team were fantastic, the whole trip was  perfectly organized.  The hotels booked were very nice,  the local lunches delicous and the guides (Amr, Zacharias) perfectly competent, friendly and tried to meet any of our needs. This was a once-in-a-lifetime-trip and worth every penny! If you want to get the full cultural experience, while still being able to relax and have fun, booking with Reisen in √Ñgypten is the way to go :)

reviews.title: Had a great day
reviews.text: Nice Trip and nice crew. Everything Went well and was very good organised. The shuttle Service to the harbor was also perfect.

reviews.title: Great experience!
reviews.text: We went on this cruise because holiday reps at our hotel were charging more. We loved it! The people are fun and friendly. They made us laugh a few times. We took our mum with us and they helped get her on and off the boat. Mody was so great! He gave up his seat on Orange bay island for her. It was someone‚Äôs birthday and they gave cake out to everyone, my mum came later and Mody never left her out. Nasser was great in explaining everything. The boat is luxury with seated decks at the top and sun loungers. Unlimited Snacks and drink were included. Food buffet was really nice, only downside is there was a cat that kept coming inside when we were eating. Orange Bay is beautiful, shallow water for kids, music, beautiful place to take photos. It‚Äôs a vibe. We stopped for snorkelling, scuba diving and fishing. It gets very veryyy chilly because of the wind so do bring a jacket or a blanket to cover yourself with. Highly recommend these guys!

reviews.title: Once again M.Y. Travel Services makes our holiday.
reviews.text:
We wouldn‚Äôt use anyone else but M.Y. Travel Services whilst in Hurghada. 
This holiday Mohamed took us from the airport to our apartment, to and from 2 different hotels, shopping and for evenings out. He even helped us sort out an issue when our fridge broke down. 
Mohamed always keeps us informed, is on time in a very clean car and charges reasonable prices. We can wholeheartedly recommend him for transport and trips.

reviews.title: 5* service üëå
reviews.text:
Mohamed picked us from our hotel Makadi gardens,dropped us to the Senzo mall,returned to pick us up to take us to the marina in Hurghada & then returned to collect us to fetch us back to the hotel.
His English is absolutely amazing,full of knowledge & gave us lots of information & tips on our journey with him.Never once did we feel uneasy with him he's a very kind man who will go out of his way for you.
On our return to the hotel he took us to some of the shops in Hurghada & it was absolutely amazing ,shops that we would have never seen without him, I had the best homemade rice pudding made with Buffalo milk (I highly recommend it üòã
I highly recommend M.Y. Travel Services üëå
5* star service,trustworthy,reliable & very reasonable in price.
I just wish we had found them at the beginning of our holiday & not towards the end of it.
We will be back & Mohamed you will be the 1st person we will contact.
Thank you for all your help.

photo.caption: Shop Eintrance / Eingang zum Tauchcenter und Shop

ranking_subcategory: #30 of 633 Boat Tours & Water Sports in Hurghada
subcategory_ranking: #30 of 633 Boat Tours & Water Sports in Hurghada
ranking: #30 of 633 Boat Tours & Water Sports in Hurghada
description: When you want more than just a holiday, come to Dive Point Red Sea. The choice is yours. We are convinced we have every opportunity to give you the holiday you want and deserve. Make your next trip, your best ever! 1992 saw the establishment of the location where thousands have learned to dive or taken the life changing step towards becoming a diving professional, and where hundreds return regularly to enjoy the highest quality of service and the attention of dedicated staff, Dive Point Red Sea. Wherever you are staying in Hurghada and Sahl Hasheesh, we can offer our services to you with FREE transfers from all the hotels. Transfers from the Makadi Bay area are available as well for a nominal daily charge. No matter if you would like to go for daily dive or snorkelling trips onboard our own spacious boats, to one of the more than 60 fabulous snorkel & dive sites around Hurghada, or want to become a diver or a diving instructor or would like to explore the deeper areas with Trimix & CCRs - we offer it all! The complete range of PADI (Recreational and Technical Diving), DAN, IART, IANTD, TDI & RAID courses is available from introductory levels up to Instructor qualifications. Our dedicated and service oriented staff team is the most experienced in the training of PADI Professionals in the Red Sea, consisting of 3 PADI Course Directors and 6 IDC Staff and Master Instructors working fulltime in the field of Instructor training. One example of our continuously developing customer service is the large investment we made in a Nitrox membrane system. The safety of our guests is our major priority and for this reason all Nitrox certified divers, receive SINCE 2001 Nitrox 32 FOR FREE in our dive centers! As a TDI training facility offering also PADI, IART, IANTD & RAID training up to Advanced Trimix Diver we are in the same time THE experts for rebreather diving in Hurghada! Ambient Pressure Inspiration & Evolution, JJ-CCR, Hollis Explorer & Prism2, Poseidon Se7en & ISC Megalodon Rebreathers are available in our rental department including spare parts & service facilities. We have an extensive stock of technical diving rental equipment, a gas filling station with Helium and Oxygen fills up to 250 bar, everything you could possibly want. Top quality storage and cleaning facilities for guest equipment are right in the diving centre as well as toilets and fresh water showers. A complete workshop with trained technicians offers the chance of equipment fixing and servicing. The setup is completed by a full dive store, which offers diving equipment for sale and in the middle of the centre is the "50 BAR Safety Stop" Tiki Bar for the time in between or after dives. All facilities have been planned and constructed by us! As PADI 5 Star Career Development Centers and 5 Star IDC Centers respectively we are able to offer a large variety of services and activities for divers, future divers and non-divers alike. Our goal every day is to provide you with an unforgettable holiday. Its time you chose Dive Point Red Sea!

description: The ORCA Dive Club in the legendary "Turtles Inn" is located directly at Abu-Tig marina, the promenade in El Gouna. It is also know for its atmospheric harbour festivals.The diving centre in El Gouna is in the favourable position to access almost 60 dive sites, 10 of which are wrecks - some are even famous. A highlight is surely a visit to the "SS Thistlegorm" probably the most famous wreck in the Red Sea. Also Abu Nuhas with its four well-known wrecks Ghannis D, Kimon M, Chrisoula K and Carnatic are within reach just as much as the 120 metre long Rosalie Moller. In the south, the diving region borders on the legendary northern areas of Hurghada such as the Carless Reef, Umm Gamar or Shaab Rur. The northern areas on the other hand are exclusive for the use of divers from El Gouna.

description: Ilios Dive Club - One with the Red Sea The Steigenberger Al Dau Resort, Red Sea, Hurghada is the home of Ilios Dive Club. On an area of 360m¬≤ we are offering everything diver, skin diver and those going to be need to have a perfect holiday. Due to over 20 years of experience in the professional management of a dive centre we guarantee our guests wonderful dives in the Red Sea. High standards and professionalism are for us the basics to feel comfortable. The dive centre is equipped with two multimedia classrooms, two big guest equipment rooms, workshop, filling station (Nitrox panel available), wheelchair accessible guest toilettes and showers and a very big rinsing area. Ilios DC is directly at the beach with our own marina in front, which allows diving and boat trips in a most comfortable way. Two private diving yachts (Al Dau 1+2) assure perfect comfort, delicious food and everything to feel relaxed on board. Certainly the whole centre is done border free, as we are already since 1992 specialized in teaching diving to people with disability. Ilios Dive Club is offering the full program; divers and non divers need to spend relaxing holidays, such as intro dives, daily diving and snorkelling tours to the beautiful dive spots of the Red Sea. Our PADI dive school offers courses from beginner up to professional. For sure we offer live aboard safaris, diving packages and special offers for groups as well. Jump into the adventure - get diving with Ilios Dive Club!

description: Charlotte has been working with horses in Hurghada for the last 12 years and has now teamed up with Jo, also from the UK to work on an exciting new project. Combining the rehabilitation of neglected horses and sharing the pleasures of the Eastern Desert with riders of all abilities and ages. Riding our beautiful Arabian cross horses in the spectacular scenery of the Eastern Desert is a life enhancing experience. We have horses for all levels, from complete beginners to professional riders, and everything in between! We have several child-friendly ponies so children are welcome. Normally, trips last from one to two hours, but we can arrange tailor-made full, half-day or overnight safaris to the mountains 20 kms away. We can also provide riding lessons if required. Safety is a priority with us so our equipment is of European standard including riding hats. Animal welfare is also a top priority. All our horses are well treated, well fed and happy!

We offer daily boat diving in guided groups of max. 8 divers per guide, smaller groups are available on request and against surcharge. Experienced divers are free to go unguided as a buddy team after their first dive with us. We offer free 12l Nitrox tanks, and if you would prefer a little more air or Nitrox 15l tanks are available against surcharge. A special highlight are the half-day Dolphin Spotting trips by our comfortable speed-boat. Half-day diving and snorkeling trips are also available and especially suitable for the last day of your diving vacation, to stay within the 24h-no-flight limitation. We are looking forward to your visit! You team at Blue Brothers Diving El Gouna!
